/study/scriptures/dc-testament/introduct.title: Ketapele
text: Dithuto le Dikgolagano ke kgobokanyo ya ditshenolo tsa selegodimo le dikitsiso tse di tlhotlheleditsweng di neetswe go tlhoma le go laola bogosi jwa Modimo mo lefatsheng mo malatsing a bofelo. Lentswa bontsi jwa ditsetlana di lebagantswe maloko a Kereke ya ga Jeso Keresete ya Baitshepi ba Malatsi a Bofelo, melaetsa, ditsiboso le dikgothatso ke di thuso tsa batho botlhe e bile di na le taletso go batho botlhe gongwe le gongwe go utlwa lentswe la Morena Jeso Keresete, a bua le bone go boitekanelo jwa lebaka lono fela le poloko ya bone e e sa khutleng.

Bontsi jwa ditshenolo mo kgobokanyong e di ne di amogetswe ka Joseph Smith Jr., moperofeti wa ntlha le poresidente wa Kereke ya ga Jeso Keresete ya Baitshepi ba Malatsi a Bofelo. Tse dingwe di ne tsa neelwa ka bangwe ba batlhatlhami ba gagwe mo Boporesidenteng. (bona ditlhogo tsa D&D 135, 136, le 138, le Kitsiso Semmuso 1 le 2).

Buka ya Dithuto le Dikgolagano ke nngwe ya mekgele ya ditiro tsa Kereke mo pataganong le Baebele e e Boitshepo, Buka ya ga Momone, le Perela e e Tlhwatlhwa Kgolo. Le fa go ntse jalo, Dithuto le Dikgolagano ga di tshwane gonne ga se thanolo ya mekwalo ya bogologolo, mme ke ya tshimologo ya segompieno mme e neetswe ke Modimo ka baperofeti ba Gagwe ba ba itshenketsweng go tsosolosa tiro ya Gagwe e e boitshepo le go tlhomamisa bogosi jwa Modimo mo lefatsheng mo malatsing ano. Mo ditshenolong, mongwe o utlwa lentswe le le nolo mme le tlhomame la Morena Jeso Keresete, a bua gape mo tebalebelong ya botlalo jwa dinako; mme tiro e e simolodisitsweng fano ke paakanyetso ya Go Tla ga Gagwe ga Bobedi, mo go diragatseng ga e bile mo tumalanong le mafoko a botlhe baperofeti ba ba boitshepo e sa le lefatshe le simologa.

Joseph Smith Jr. o tshotswe Sedimonthole 23, 1805, mo Sharon, Windsor County, Vermont. Mo botshelong jwa gagwe jwa pele, o ne a fudugela le lolwapa la gagwe kwa Manchester wa gompieno, mo bophirima jwa New York. E ne e le fa a santse a nna teng mo dikgakologong tsa 1820, fa a ne a na le dingwaga tse di lesome le bone, fa a ne a itemogela ponatshegelo ya gagwe ya ntlha, e mo go yone a neng a etelwa ka sebele ke Modimo Rraetsho wa Bosakhutleng, le Morwawe Jeso Keresete. O ne a bolelelwa mo ponatshegelong e gore Kereke ya boammaaruri ya ga Jeso Keresete eo e neng e tlhomamisitswe mo metlheng ya Kgolaganong e Ntsha, le e e diretseng botlalo jwa efangele, e ne e sa tlhole e le mo lefatsheng. Tse dingwe diponatshegelo tsa selegodimo di ne tsa sala morago tse mo go tsone a neng a rutwa ke baengele ba bantsi; o ne a supegediwa gore Modimo o na le tiro e tlhaolegileng ya gagwe go e dira mo lefatsheng le gore ka ene Kereke ya ga Jeso Keresete e tlaa buselediwa mo lefatsheng.

Mo mo tsamaong ya nako, Joseph Smith o a nonotshiwa ka thuso ya semodimo go ranola le go anamisa Buka ya ga Momone. Go sale jalo ene le Oliver Cowdery ba tlhongwa go Boperesiti jwa ga Arone ke Johane Mokolobetsi ka Motsheganong 1829 (bona D&D 13), mme moragonyana ga foo ba ne le bone ba tlhongwa go Boperesiti jwa ga Melekiseteke ke Baaposetole ba bogologolo Petere, Jakobe le Johane (bona D&D 27:12). Ditlhomo tse dingwe di ne tsa latela tse mo go tsone dilotlele tsa boperesiti di neng tsa neelwa ka Moshe, Elija, Eliase, le bontsi jwa baperofeti ba bogologolo (bona D&D 110; 128:18, 21). Ditlhomo tseno, ene ka nnete, e le tsosoloso ya taolo ya semodimo go motho mo lefatsheng. Ka Moranang 6, 1830, ka fa tlase ga kaelo ya legodimo, Moperofeti Joseph Smith o ne a rulaganya Kereke, le jaana Kereke ya boammaaruri ya ga Jeso Keresete e gape e dira jaaka mokgatlho mo gare ga batho, ka taolo go ruta efangele le go direla ditlhomo tsa poloko. (Bona D&D 20 le Perela e e Tlhwatlhwa Kgolo, Joseph Smith—Ditso 1.)

Ditshenolo tse di boitshepo tse di amogetswe mo karabong ya thapelo, mo dinakong tsa letlhoko, le go tswa mo diemong tsa botshelo tota tse di akaretsa batho tota. Moperofeti le ditsala tsa gagwe ba batlile kaelo ya semodimo, mme ditshenolo tse di tlhomamisa gore ba e amogetse. Mo ditshenolong, mongwe o bona tsosoloso le phuthologo ya efangele ya ga Jeso Keresete le go tsena mo ga tebalebelo ya botlalo jwa dinako. Go tsamaya ga Kereke go tswa bophirimatsatsi jwa New York le Pennsylvania go ya Ohio, go ya Missouri, go ya Illinois, mme la bofelo go ya Great Basin wa bophirima jwa Amerika le ditshukatshukano tse di maatla tsa Baitshepi mo go lekeng go aga Sione mo lefatsheng mo dinakong tsa gompieno le gone go a supiwa mo ditshenolong tse.

Dingwe tsa ditsetlana tsa pele di akaretsa dikgang mabapi le thanolo le kanamiso ya Buka ya ga Momone (bona tsetlana 3, 5, 10, 17, le 19). Dingwe tsa ditsetlana tsa morago di supa tiro ya Moperofeti Joseph Smith mo go direng thanolo e e tlhotlheleditsweng ya Baebele, nako eo bontsi jwa dithuto tse dikgolo tsa ditsetlana tsa amogelwa (bona, ka sekai, ditsetlana 37, 45, 73, 76, 77, 86, 91, le 132, nngwe le nngwe ya tsone e na le tshwaragano e tlhamaletseng le thanolo ya Baebele).

Mo tshenolong, dithuto tsa efangele di tlhongwa ka ditlhaloso ka ga dilo tsa motheo jaaka tlholego ya Bomodimo, motheo wa motho, bonnete jwa ga Satane, maikaelelo a se se swang, botlhokwa jwa kutlo, go tlhokega ga boikwatlhao, ditiro tsa Mowa o o Boitshepo, ditlhomo le ditiragalo tse e leng tsa poloko, bowelo jwa lefatshe, diemo tsa lobaka lo lo tlang tsa motho morago ga Tsogo le Katlholo, bosakhutleng jwa botsalano jwa lenyalo, le tlholego ya bo sa khutleng ya lolwapa. Fela jalo, tlhatlologanyo ya phuthologo ya popego ya taolo ya Kereke e supiwa ka pitso ya bobishopo, Boporesidente jwa Ntlha, Lekgotla la ba ba Lesome le Bobedi, le ba ba Masome a Supa le tlhomamisoya tse dingwe diofisi tsa taolo le dikhoramo. La bofelo, bopaki jo bo neetsweng jwa ga Jeso Keresete—Bo semodimo jwa Gagwe, borena jwa Gagwe, go itekanela Gagwe, lorato lwa Gagwe, le thata ya thekololo ya Gagwe—go dira buka e boleng jo bogolo go lolwapa la motho le “tshwanelo go Kereke le mahumo a Lefatshe ka bophara” (bona setlhogo go D&D 70).

Ditshenolo tse kwa tshimologong dikwadilwe ke bakwadi ba ga Joseph Smith, mme maloko a Kereke ka kgatlhego e kgolo ba abelana merirti ya tse dikwadilweng ka seatla. Go dira tshupo ya se nnela ruri, bakwadi ba tloga ba kopela ditshenolo tse mo sekwalong sa tshupo ya dibuka, tse baeteledipele ba Kereke ba di dirisitseng mo go baakanyetseng go gatisiwa ga ditshenolo. Joseph le Baitshepi ba pele ba tsere ditshenolo tse jaaka Kereke e di tsaya: di tshidile, di le tlhaga, le go tshwanelwa ke go ntlafatswa ka tshenolo ya tlalaletso. Le gone ba ne ba lemoga gore diphoso tse di sa ikaelelwang di ne di ka tswa di diragetse ka tsamaiso ya go kopa ditshenolo le go di baakanyetsa kanamiso. Jaana, khonforense ya Kereke ya kopa Joseph Smith ka 1831 go “baakanya diphoso tseo kgotsa ditimelo tse a ka di lemogang ka Mowa o o Boitshepo.”

Morago ga ditshenolo di sena go kelekwa le go baakangwa, Maloko a Kereke mo Missouri a simolola go gatisa setlhogo sa buka A Book of Commandments for the Government of the Church of Christ, e e nang le ditshenolo tse dintsi tsa pele tsa Moperofeti. Teko e ya ntlha go anamisa ditshenolo ya khutla, le fa gontse jalo, fa digagautlhi di senya ofisi ya kgatiso ya Baitshepi mo Khaunthing ya Jackson Phukwi 20, 1833.

Mo go utlweng ka tshenyo ya ofisi ya kgatiso ya Missouri, Joseph Smith le ba bangwe ba baeteledipele ba Kereke ba simolola di paakanyo go anamisa ditshenolo mo Kirtland, Ohio. Gape go baakanya diphoso, go rurifatsa mafoko, le go lemoga ditlhabologo mo dithutong le thulaganyo tsa Kereke, Joseph Smith o ne a okama kanoko ya mokwalo wa ditshenolo dingwe go di baakanyetsa kanamiso ka 1835 jaaka Doctrine and Covenants of the Church of the Latter Day Saints (Dithuto le Dikgolagano tsa Kereke ya Baitshepi ba Malatsi a Bofelo). Joseph Smith a letlelela e nngwe ya kgatiso ya Dithuto le Dikgolagano, e o e neng ya anamisiwa dikgwedi fela morago ga go swela tumelo ga ga Moperofeti ka 1844.

Baitshepi ba Malatsi a Bofelo ba pele ba tsaya ditshenolo mme ba di tsaya jaka melaetsa go tswa kwa Modimong. Mo lobakeng longwe ka 1831, bagolwane bangwe ba le mokawana ba Kereke ba neela bopaki jo bomasisi gore Morena o supile tshupo go mewa ya bone ka boammaaruri jwa ditshenolo. Bopaki jo bo anamisitswe mo kanamisong ya 1835 le Dithuto le Dikgolagano jaaka bopaki jo bo kwadilweng jwa Baaposetole Ba ba Lesome le Bobedi.
Bopaki jwa Basupi go Buka ya Ditaelo tsa Morena, ditaelo tseo a di neetseng go Kereke ya Gagwe ka Joseph Smith, Jun., yo o a neng a tlhomilwe ka lentswe la Kereke go boikaelelo jo:

Ke gone ka moo, re, ikutlwa go rata go fa bopaki go lefatshe lotlhe la batho, go sebopiwa sengwe le sengwe mo sefatlhogong sa lefatshe, gore Morena o file pego go mewa ya rona, ka Mowa o o Boitshepo o goromeditsweng mo go rona, gore ditaelo tse di neetswe ka tlhotlheletso ya Modimo, mme ke thuso go batho botlhe e bile ruri di boammaaruri.

Re neela bopaki go lefatshe, Morena e le mothusi wa rona; mme ke ka letlhogonolo la Modimo Rraetsho, le Morwawe, Jeso Keresete, gore re letlelesega go nna le sebaka sa go fa bopaki go lefatshe, mo o re ipelang mo go feteletseng, re rapela Morena ka metlha gore bana ba batho ba ka thusega jalo.
Maina a ba ba Lesome le Bobedi e ne e le:
Thomas B. Marsh
David W. Patten
Brigham Young
Heber C. Kimball
Orson Hyde
William E. McLellin
Parley P. Pratt
Luke S. Johnson
William Smith
Orson Pratt
John F. Boynton
Lyman E. Johnson

Mo ditatelano tsa dikgatiso tsa Dithuto le Dikgolagano, ditshenolo tse di tlalaletsang kgotsa dikgang dingwe tsa tshupo di tlalaleditswe, jaaka di amogetswe le jaaka di amogelwa ke diphuthego tse di lekanang kgotsa dikhonforense tsa Kereke. Kgatiso ya 1876, e e baakantsweng ke Mogolwane Orson Pratt ka fa tlase ga kaelo ya ga Brigham Young, e rulagantse ditshenolo ka ditiragalo mme a tlamela ditlhogo tse disha di na le diketapele tsa ditso.

Go simolola ka kgatiso ya 1835, thatelano ya dithuto tse supa tsa sedumedi le tsone tsa akarediwa, tse di ne tsa fiwa setlhogo sa Lectures on Faith. Tse di ne di baakantswe go dirisiwa mo Sekolong sa Baperofeti mo Kirtland, Ohio go tswa 1834 go ya 1835. Lentswa di thuso ka dithuto le tao, dithuto tse ditlogetsweng go tswa Dithuto le Dikgolagano e sale ka kgatiso ya 1921 gonne di ne di sa neelwa kgotsa disupilwe jaaka ditshenolo go Kereke ka bophara.

Kgatiso ya Sekgoa ya 1981 ya Dithuto le Dikgolagano, mekwalo e meraro ene ya akarediwa e le lantlha. Tseno ke ditsetlana 137 le 138, di baya pele metheo ya poloko ya baswi; le Kitsiso Semmuso 2, itsise gore banna botlhe ba maloko a Kereke ba ba tshwanelwang ba ka tlhongwa go boperesiti go sena tlhokomelo ya letso le mmala.

Nngwe le nngwe e ntsha ya kgatiso ya Dithuto le Dikgolagano e baakantse diphoso tse di fetileng le go oketsa polelo e ntsha, bogolobogolo mo dikarolong tsa ditso tsa ditlhogo tsa tsetlana. Kgatiso ya gompieno e ntlafatsa malatsi le maina a lefelo le go dira dipaakanyo tse dingwe. Diphetogo tseno di dirilwe go tlisa di dirisiwa mo go tshwaneng le polelo e e nepagetseng bogolo ya ditso. Tse dingwe tse di tlhaolegile dipopego tsa kgatiso ya bosheng di akaretsa mmepe e dirilweng sesha e supa boremelelo jwa thutafatshe tsa mafelo ao mo go one ditshenolo di ne di amogetswe, le dinepe tse ditokafaditsweng tsa mafelo a ditso tsa Kereke, dinankolo, ditlhogo tsa tsetlana, le ditshoboko tsa setlhogo sa kgang, tsotlhe tse di dirilweng go thusa babadi go tlhaloganya le go ipela mo molaetseng wa Morena jaaka o neetswe mo Dithuto le Dikgolagano. Polelo ka ditlhogo tsa tsetlana di tserwe go tswa Mekwalo ya Ditso tsa Kereke e e anamisitsweng History of the Church (Ditso tsa Kereke) (tsotlhe dikai mo ditlhogong jaaka ditso tsa ga Joseph Smith) le Joseph Smith Papers (Dipampiri tsa ga Joseph Smith).

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/1.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 1
chapter_summary: 1–7, Lentswe la tlhagiso le go batho botlhe; 8–16, Boitimokanyo le boikepo di tlaa nna teng pele ga Go tla ga Bobedi; 17–23, Joseph Smith o biditswe go tsosolosa go lefatshe boammaaruri le dithata tsa Morena; 24–33, Buka ya ga Momone e tsisiwa fa pele e bile Kereke ya boammaaruri e a tlhomiwa; 34–36, Kagiso e tlaa ntshiwa mo lefatsheng; 37–39, Batlang ditaelo tse.

verses.text: Utlwang, Ao! lona batho ba kereke ya me, go bua lentswe la ene yoo nnang kwa godimo, yoo matlho a gagwe a mo bathong botlhe; ee, ammaruri Ka re: Utlwang lona batho lo le kgakala; le lona bao le mo ditlhaketlhakeng tsa lewatle, reetsang mmogo.

Gonne ammaruri lentswe la Morena le mo bathong botlhe, mme ga gona ope yo o ka falolang; e bile ga go leitlho lepe le le se kitlang le le bona, le fa e le tsebe e e se kitlang e le utlwa, le e seng pelo e e se kitlang e amiwa.
Mme ditsuolodi di tlaa tlhabiwa ka kutlobotlhoko e kgolo; gonne boikepo jwa bone bo tlaa buiwa mo ditlhoeng tsa matlo, mme ditiro tsa bone tsa sephiri di tlaa senolwa.
Mme lentswe la tlhagiso le tlaa nna go batho botlhe, ka melomo ya barutwana ba me, bao ke ba itshenketseng mo malatsing ano a bofelo.
Mme ba tlaa tswela pele e bile ga go ope yoo tlaa ba kgoreletsang, gonne Nna Morena ke ba laotse.
Bonang, seno ke taolo ya me, le taolo ya batlhanka ba me, le diketapele tsa buka ya ditaelo tsa me, eo Ke ba e neetseng go e anamisa mo go bone, Ao! lona banni ba lefatshe.
Ke gone, boifang le rorome, lona batho, gonne se nna Morena Ke se ba laoletseng se tlaa diragadiwa.
Mme ammaruri Ke a lo raya, gore bao ba tswelelang pele, ba bolela mafoko a go banni ba lefatshe, go bone thata neetswe go kana mo lefatsheng le kwa legodimong, ba ba sa dumeleng le ba ba tsuologang;
Ee, ammaruri, go ba kanela go letsatsi la fa tshakgalo ya Modimo e goromeletswa mo baikeping go sena selekanyo—
Go letsatsi leo Morena a tlaa tlang go duela motho mongwe le mongwe ka fa tirong ya gagwe, le go lekanyetsa motho mongwe le mongwe ka fa a lekanyeditseng mong ka ene selekanyo ka teng.
Ke gone lentswe la Morena le kwa dikhutlong tsa lefatshe, gore botlhe bao ba tlaa utlwang ba ka utlwa:
Ipaakanyetseng, ipaakanyetseng seo se se tlang, gonne Morena o gaufi;
Mme bogale jwa Morena bo a tuka, e bile tshaka ya gagwe e tlhapile mo legodimong, mme e tlaa wela mo banning ba lefatshe.

Mme letsogo la Morena le tlaa senolwa; mme letsatsi le etla leo ba ba se kitlang ba utlwa lentswe la Morena, le fa e le lentswe la batlhanka ba gagwe, le e seng go tlhokomela mafoko a baperofeti le baaposetole, ba tlaa kgaolwang go tswa mo gare ga batho;
Gonne ba dule mo ditlhomong tsa me, e bile ba robile kgolagano ya me ya bosenang bokhutlo;

Ga ba batle Morena go tlhomamisa tshiamo ya gagwe, mme motho mongwe le mongwe o itsamaela mo tseleng ya gagwe, le morago ga setshwantsho sa modimo wa gagwe, yoo setshwantsho sa gagwe se leng mo setshwanong sa lefatshe, le yoo boleng jwa gagwe e le boleng jwa medimo ya disetwa, e e tsofalang mme e tlaa nyelela mo Babilone, e leng Babilone o mogolo, yoo tlaa wang.
Ke gone, Nna Morena, ke itse petso e e ka tlang mo banning ba lefatshe, ka bitsa motlhanka wa me Joseph Smith, Jun., mme ka bua le ene go tswa legodimong, le go mo neela ditaelo;
Mme le gone ka neela ditaelo go ba bangwe, gore ba tshwanetse go bolela dilo tseno go lefatshe; mme tsotlhe tseno gore go tle go diragadiwe, mo go kwadilwe ke baperofeti—
Dilo tse di bokowa tsa lefatshe di tlaa tla pele le go roba tse di maatla le tse di thata, gore motho a se kitla a gakolola mong ka ene, le fa e le go ikanya mo letsogong la nama—
Mme gore motho mongwe le mongwe a tle a bue mo leineng la Morena Modimo, e bong Mmoloki wa lefatshe;
Gore tumelo le yone e tle e ntsifale mo lefatsheng;
Gore kgolagano ya me ya bosenang bokhutlo e tle e tlhomamisiwe;
Gore botlalo jwa efangele ya me bo tle bo bolelwe ke ba ba bokowa le ba ba bori go ya bokhutlong jwa lefatshe, le fa pele ga dikgosi le babusi.
Bonang, Ke nna Modimo mme ke e buile; ditaelo tse ke tsa me, mme di neetswe batlhanka ba me mo makoweng a bone, ka fa mokgweng wa puo ya bone, gore ba tlhaloganye.
Mme e re jaaka ba fosa, ba ka nna ba itsisiwe;
Mme e re jaaka ba batla tlhalefo ba tle ba rutwe;
Mme e re jaaka ba leofile ba tle ba otlhaiwe, gore ba tle ba ikwatlhaye;
Mme e re jaaka ba le boikokobetso ba tle ba thatafadiwe, le go segofadiwa go tswa kwa godimo, le go amogela kitso nako le nako.

Mme morago fa ba sena go amogela tshupo ya Banifae, ee, le e leng motlhanka wa me Joseph Smith, Jun., a tle a nne le thata ya go ranola ka kutlwelobotlhoko ya Modimo, ka thata ya Modimo, Buka ya ga Momone.

Mme le mo go bone bao ba neetsweng ditaelo tse, ba tle ba nne le thata ya go thaya motheo wa kereke, le go e ntsha go tswa mo bofitlheng le go tswa mo lefifing, kereke fela ya boammaaruri e ka nosi e leng e e tshelang mo sefatlhogong sa lefatshe lotlhe, e ka yone Nna, Morena, Ke e kgatlhegel6+ang thata, ke bua le kereke ka tshoboko e seng ka bongwe—
Gonne Nna Morena ga ke ka ke ka lebelela sebe le fa e le ka selekanyo se se potlana sa tetlelelo;
Le fa go ntse jalo, yoo a ikwatlhayang a bo a diragatsa ditaelo tsa Morena o tlaa itshwarelwa;
Mme yoo sa ikwatlhayeng, mo go ene go tlaa tsewa le lone lesedi le a le tshotseng; gonne Mowa wa me ga o kitla ka metlha o sokasokana le motho, go bua Morena wa Masomosomo.
Mme gape, ammaruri Ka re go lona, Ao! banni ba lefatshe: Nna Morena ke thato ya me gore ke itsise dilo tse go nama yotlhe;

Gonne Nna ga ke motlotli wa batho, mme ke thato ya me gore batho botlhe ba itse gore letsatsi ka bonako le etla; oura ga ise e tle, mme e atametse, fa kagiso e tlaa tsewa mo lefatsheng, mme diabole o tlaa nna le thata mo pusong ya gagwe.
Mme le ene Morena o tlaa nna le thata godimo ga baitshepi ba gagwe, e bile o tlaa busa mo gareng ga bone, le go fologela kwa tlase mo katlholong ya Idumea, kgotsa lefatshe.
Batlang ditaelo tse, gonne di boammaaruri le boikanyego, mme diperofeto le ditsholofetso tse di mo go tsone di tlaa diragadiwa.

Se Nna Morena ke se buileng, ke se buile, mme e bile ga ke ipate, le mororo magodimo le lefatshe di feta, lefoko la me ga le kitla le feta, mme le tlaa diragadiwa lotlhe, e ka tswa e le ka lentswe la me kgotsa ka lentswe la batlhanka ba me, go a tshwana.
Gonne bonang, mme bonang, Morena ke Modimo, mme Mowa o supa tshupo, mme tshupo e boammaaruri, e bile boammaaruri bo nna ka bo senang bokhutlo. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/2.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 2
chapter_summary: 1, Elija o tlaa senola boperesiti; 2–3, Ditsholofetso tsa borraabone di tlhomiwa mo dipelong tsa bana.

verses.text: Bonang, Ke tlaa lo senolela Boperesiti, ka seatla sa ga Elija moperofeti, pele ga go tla ga letsatsi le legolo le le boitshegang la Morena.
Mme o tlaa tlhoma mo dipelong tsa bana ditsholofetso tse di dirilweng mo go borraabone, mme dipelo tsa bana di tlaa sokologela go tsa borraabone.
Fa go ne go sa nna jalo, lefatshe lotlhe le tlaa senngwa gotlhelele mo go tleng ga gagwe.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/3.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 3
chapter_summary: 1–4, Tsela ya Morena ke tikologo e le nngwe ya bo sa khutleng; 5–15, Joseph Smith o tshwanetse go ikwatlhaya kgotsa o tlaa latlhegelwa ke neo ya go ranola; 16–20, Buka ya ga Momone e tlaa ya pele go boloka peo ya ga Lihae.

verses.text: Ditiro, le ditogamaano, le maikaelelo a Modimo ga di ka ke tsa retelelwa, le fa e le go ka nna tsa sepe.

Gonne Modimo ga a tsamaye mo ditselaneng tsa tshiamololo, le fa e le go fetogela ka fa seatleng sa moja le fa e le sa molema, le fa e le go farologana go tswa go seo se a se buileng, ke gone ditselana tsa gagwe di tlhamaletse, le tsela ya gagwe ke tikologo e le nngwe ya bo sa khutleng.
Gakologelwa, gakologelwa gore ga se tiro ya Modimo e e retelelwang, mme tiro ya batho;

Le fa gone motho a ka nna le ditshenolo tse dintsi, le go nna le thata go dira ditiro tse dikgolo, e tswa fa a ikgantsha ka nonofo ya gagwe, e bile a tsaya dikgakololo tsa Modimo e se sepe, le go sala morago ditaelo tsa thato ya gagwe le dikeletso tsa senama, o tshwanetse go wa le go tsisa ipusolosetso ya Modimo o o siameng mo go ene.
Bona, o neetswe dilo tseno, mme ditaelo tsa gago di ne di gagametse go le kae; mme gakologelwa le tsone ditsholofetso tse di neng di dirilwe go wena, fa o ne o sa di tlola.
Mme bona, ke gantsi jang o tlola ditaelo le melao ya Modimo, le go ya le ditlhotlheletso tsa batho.
Gonne, bona, o ka bo o ne o sa boifa motho bogolo go feta Modimo. Le fa motho a tsaya dikgakololo tsa Modimo e se sepe, le go nyatsa mafoko a gagwe—
E bile o ka bo o nnile boikanyego; mme o ka bo a otlolotse letsogo la gagwe le go go thusa mo metswi yotlhe e e molelo ya mmaba; mme o ka bo a nnile le wena nako nngwe le nngwe ya tshwenyego.
Bona, wena o Joseph, mme o itshenketswe go dira tiro ya Morena, mme ka ntlha ya tlolo, fa o sa tlhagafala o tlaa wa.

Mme gakologelwa, Modimo o boutlwelobotlhoko, ke gone ka moo, ikwatlhayele se o se dirileng se se tlhabaganeng le taelo e Ke go e neetseng, mme o santse o itshenketswe, mme gape o santse o bileditswe go dira tiro e;
Fa e se o dira se, o tlaa ntshiwa mme wa nna jaaka batho ba bangwe, e bile o sena neo.
Mme e rile o ntsha se Modimo a ne a go neetse pono le thata ya go se ranola, o ntsheditse seo se neng se le boitshepo mo diatleng tsa monna o o boikepo.

Yoo nyaditseng dikgakololo tsa Modimo, mme a robileng ditsholofetso tse di boitshepo bogolo tse di dirilweng fa pele ga Modimo, mme a ne a ikantse ka katlholo ya gagwe e bile a ikgantsha ka tlhalefo ya gagwe.
Mme se ke lebaka la go bo o latlhegetswe ke ditshiamelo tsa gago ka lobaka—
Gonne o leseleditse kgakololo ya mokaedi wa gago go gatakwa go tswa kwa tshimologong.
Le fa go ntse jalo, tiro ya me e tlaa tswela pele, gonne e re ka jaaka kitso ya Mmoloki e tsile mo lefatsheng, ka bopaki jwa Bajuta, fela jalo kitso ya Mmoloki e tlaa tla mo bathong ba me—
Le go Banefi, le Bajakobe, le Bajosefa, le Bazoramo, ka bopaki jwa borraabone—

Mme bopaki jo bo tlaa tla mo kitsong ya Balamane, le Balemuele, le Baishimaele, ba ba tseneng mo go sa dumeleng ka ntlha ya boikepo jwa borraabone, ba Morena a ba leseleditseng go nyeletsa bakaulengwe ba bone Banefi, ka ntlha ya maikepo le makgapha a bone.
Mme ke ka boikaelelo jo dipapetlana tse di dibetswe, tse di nang le ditshupo tseno—gore ditsholofetso tsa Morena di tle di diragadiwe, tse a di dirileng go batho ba gagwe;

Le gore Balamanaetse ba tle ba tle mo kitsong ya borraabone, le gore ba tle ba itse ditsholofetso tsa Morena, e bile gore ba ka dumela efangele le go ikaega ka bokgoni jwa ga Jeso Keresete, mme ba galalediwe ka tumelo mo leineng la gagwe, e bile gore ka boikwatlhao jwa bone ba tle ba bolokwe. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/4.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 4
chapter_summary: 1–4, Tirelo ya bopelokgale e boloka badiredi ba Morena; 5–6, Boleng jwa bomodimo bo ba nitamisetsa bodiredi; 7, Dilo tsa Modimo di tshwanetse go batlwa.

verses.text: Jaanong bonang, tiro e e gakgamatshang e tloga e tla mo gareng ga bana ba batho.

Ke gone ka moo, Ao! Lona bao ba le tsenang mo tirelong ya Modimo, bonang gore le mo direla ka tsotlhe dipelo tsa lona, maatla, tlhaloganyo le nonofo, gore le ka ema lo sena molato fa pele ga Modimo ka letsatsing la bofelo.
Ke gone ka moo, fa lo eletsa go direla Modimo lo bilediwa tiro;
Gonne bonang tshimo e setse e le tshweu go robiwa; mme bona, ene yoo latlhelang sekele ka maatla a gagwe, ene yoo o ipeela mo mabolokelong gore a senyelele, mme a tlise poloko go mowa wa gagwe;
Mme tumelo, tsholofelo, lorato le lerato, ka leitlho fela le le bonang kgalalelo ya Modimo, di mo atlegisetsa tiro e.
Gakologelwa tumelo, bomolemo, kitso, tekano, bopelotelele, bosiami jwa bakaulengwe, semodimo, lorato, boikokobetso, botlhaga.
Kopa, mme o tlaa amogela; kokota, mme o tlaa bulelwa. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/5.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 5
chapter_summary: 1–10, Tshika e e tlaa amogela lefoko la Morena ka Joseph Smith; 11–18, Basupi ba ba bararo ba tlaa fa bopaki ka Buka ya ga Momone; 19–20, Lefoko la Morena le tlaa tlhomamisiwa jaaka mo nakong e e fetileng; 21–35, Martin Harris o ka ikwatlhaya mme a nne mongwe wa basupi.

verses.text: Bona, Ke a go raya, gore jaaka motlhanka wa me Martin Harris a eletsa bosupi mo seatleng sa me, gore wena, motlhanka wa me Joseph Smith, Jun., o tshotse dipapetlana tseo pakileng le go supa tshupo gore o di amogetse mo go nna;

Mme jaanong, bona, se o tlaa se bua go ene—ene yoo buileng le wena, o rile go wena: Nna, Morena, ke Modimo, mme ke go nneile dilo tse, motlhanka wa me Joseph Smith, Jun., mme ke go laotse gore o tshwanetse go ema jaaka mosupi wa dilo tseno;
Mme Ke go dirile gore o tsene mo kgolaganong le nna, gore o se ka wa di ba bontsha fa e se fela go batho bao ke go ba laoletseng; mme ga o na thata mo go tsone fa e se ke e go neela.

Mme o na le neo ya go ranola dipapetlana; mme e ke neo ya ntlha e ke go e neetseng; e bile ke go laotse gore o tshwanetse go se ke o ipaya go neo epe e nngwe go fitlha boikaelelo jwa me bo diragadiwa mo go se; gonne ga ke kake ka go naya neo epe e nngwe go fitlha e fela.
Ammaaruri, Ke a go raya, gore bohutsana bo tlaa tla mo banning ba lefatshe fa ba sa utlwe mafoko a me;
Gonne morago ga se o tlaa tlhongwa le go tswela pele le go bua mafoko a me go bana ba batho.

Bona, fa ba ka se kitla ba dumela mafoko a me, ga ba kitla ba go dumela, motlhanka wa me Joseph Smith, le fa gone go kgonega gore o ka ba bontsha dilo tsotlhe tse ke di tlhomileng ka fa tlase ga tlhokomelo ya gago.
Ao! A tshika e e sa dumeleng e bile e le tlhogo thata—bogale jwa me bo a ba tukela.

Bona, ammaaruri ke a go raya, ke sadisitse dilo tseo tse ke di go neetseng, wena motlhanka wa me Joseph, ka boikaelelo jwa tlhalefo mo go nna, mme go tlaa itsisiwe mo tshikeng ya lobaka lo lo kwa pele;
Mme tshika e e tlaa nna le lefoko la me ka wena;

Mme mo tlalaletsong ya bopaki jwa gago, bopaki jwa batlhanka ba me ba bararo, ba ke tlaa ba bitsang le go ba tlhoma, bao mo go bone Ke tlaa bontshang dilo tse, e bile ba tlaa tswela pele ka mafoko a me a a neetsweng ka wena.
Ee, ba tlaa itse ka nnete gore dilo tse di boammaaruri, gonne go tswa legodimong Ke tlaa ba di bolelela.
Ke tlaa ba neela thata gore ba ka bona le pono ya dilo tseno jaaka di ntse;

Mme ga ke tle go neela ope o sele thata e, go amogela bopaki jono mo gare ga tshika e, mo go se tshimologo ya tsogo le go tla ga kereke ya me go tswa mo nageng—e senoga jaaka ngwedi, e bile e phatsima jaaka letsatsi, mme e boitshega jaaka batlhabani ka mekgele.
Mme bopaki jwa basupi ba bararo ke tlaa bo romela go ya pele mo lefokong la me.
Mme bonang, botlhe fela ba ba dumelang mo mafokong a me, bone ke tlaa ba lekola ka ponatshegelo ya Mowa; mme ba tlaa tsholwa mo go nna, e leng ka metsi le ka Mowa—
Mme o tshwanetse go ema e tswa lobakanyana, gonne ga o ise o tlhomiwe—
Mme bopaki jwa bone le bone bo tlaa tswela pele go tshekiso ya tshika e fa e thatafatsa dipelo tsa yone kgatlhanong le bone;

Gonne sebetso se se swafatsang se tlaa tswela pele mo gare ga banni ba lefatshe, mme se tlaa tswelela se goromediwa go tswa nako le nako, fa ba sa ikwatlhaye, go fitlhelela lefatshe le le lolea, mme banni ba lone ba nyeleditswe e bile ba sentswe gotlhelele ka phatsimo ya go tla ga me.
Bonang, Ke go bolelela dilo tseno, fela jaaka le gone Ke boleletse batho ka tshenyo ya Jerusalema; mme lefoko la me le tlaa rurifadiwa ka nako e jaaka go fitlha jaana le rurifaditswe.
Mme jaanong ke a go laela, motlhanka wa me Joseph Smith, go ikwatlhaya le go tsamaya ka thokgamo fa pele ga me, le go se ineele mo ditlhotlheletsong tsa batho ka gope;
Mme gore o nitame mo go tshegetseng ditaelo tse Ke go laotseng ka tsone; e bile fa o dira se, bona Ke go naya botshelo jo bo sa khutleng, e leng fa o ka bolawa.
Mme jaanong, gape, Ke bua mo go wena, motlhanka wa me Joseph Smith, mabapi le monna yoo a eletsang bosupi—

Bona, Ka re mo go ene, o a ikgodisa mme ga a ikokobetse mo go lekaneng fa pele ga me; mme fa a ka obama fa pele ga me, le go ikokobetsa mo thapelong e e maatla le tumelo, mo boitshekong jwa pelo, ke gone Ke tlaa mo neela pono ya dilo tse a eletsang go di bona.

Mme o tlaa re go batho ba tshika e: Bonang, ke bone dilo tseo Morena a di bontshitseng Joseph Smith, Jun., mme ke a itse ka nnete gore di boammaaruri, gonne ke di bone, gonne di bontshitswe mo go nna ka thata ya Modimo mme e seng ya motho.

Mme Nna Morena ke mo laotse, motlhanka wa me Martin Harris, gore a se ka a bua le bone gotlhelele mabapi le dilo tse, fa e se a tlaa a re: Ke di bone, mme ke di bontshitswe ka thata ya Modimo; mme a ke mafoko a a tlaa a buang.
Mme fa a latola se o tlaa bo a roba kgolagano e a golaganeng le nna go le pele, mme bona, o tlaa sekisiwa.

Mme jaanong, fa e se a ikokobetsa le go ipolela mo go nna dilo tse a di dirileng tse di phoso, mme a dire kgolagano le nna gore o tlaa tshegetsa ditaelo tsa me, mme a diragatsa tumelo mo go nna, bona, Ke bua le ene, o tlaa seke a nne le ditebo tseo, gonne ga ke ne ke mo fa ditebo tsa dilo tseo ke di buileng.
Mme fa go ntse jalo, Ke a go laola, motlhanka wa me Joseph, gore o mo reye o re, a se dire ka gope, le fa e le go ntshwenya ka gope mabapi le selo se.
Mme fa go ntse jalo, bona Ke a go raya Joseph, e tlaa re o ranotse ditsebe di se kae o tla ema ka sebakanyana, go fitlha ke go laola gape; jalo o ka ranola gape.
Mme fa e se o dira se, bona, ga o kitla o nna le neo ka gope, mme ke tlaa tlosa dilo tse ke di go neetseng.

Mme jaanong, gonne ke bonelapele go go lalela go go nyeletsa, ee, ke bonelapele gore fa motlhanka wa me Martin Harris a sa ikokobetse le go amogela bosupi go tswa mo seatleng sa me, gore o tlaa wela mo tlolong;
Mme ba bantsi ba ba letileng ka bokukuni jwa go go nyeletsa go go tlosa mo sefatlhogong sa lefatshe; mme ka lebaka le, gore malatsi a gago a okediwe, ke go neetse ditaelo tse.
Ee, ka lebaka le ke rile: Ema, mme ema fela go fitlha ke go laola, mme ke tlaa go baakanyetsa mekgwa e ka yone o ka diragatsa selo se ke go se laetseng.
Mme fa o le boikanyego mo go tshegetseng ditaelo tsa me, o tlaa tsholetswa mo letsatsing la bofelo. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/6.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 6
chapter_summary: 1–6, Badiri mo tshimong ya Morena ba amogela poloko; 7–13, Ga gona neo e kgolo go feta neo ya poloko; 14–27, Bosupi jwa boammaaruri bo tla ka thata ya Mowa; 28–37, Leba kwa go Keresete, mme o tswelele o dira molemo.

verses.text: Tiro e kgolo e e gakgamatsang e tloga e tla mo gare ga bana ba batho.

Bonang, Ke nna Modimo; tlhokomela lefoko la me, le le tshelang mme le le thata, le le bogale go feta tshaka e e magale mabedi, go kgaoganya ka bogare ditokololo mmogo le moko; ke gone ka moo tlhokomela mafoko a me.

Bonang, tshimo e setse e le tsweu go robiwa, ke gone ka moo, le fa e le mang a eletsang go roba, a a latlhele sekele ya gagwe ka maatla a gagwe, mme a robe fa letsatsi le sale teng, gore a ka bolokela mowa wa gagwe poloko ya bosenang bokhutlo mo bogosing jwa Modimo.
Ee, le fa e le mang yoo a tlaa latlhelang sekele ya gagwe mme a robe, ene yoo o biditswe mo Modimong.
Ke gone ka moo, fa o kopa mo go nna o tlaa amogela; fa o kokota o tlaa bulelwa.
Jaanong, jaaka lo kopile, bonang, Ke a lo raya, tshegetsang ditaelo tsa me, mme lo batle go tsisa le go tlhomamisa ntlha ya Sione;
Se batleng mahumo mme tlhalefo, mme bona, masaitseweng a Modimo o tlaa phuthololelwa, mme ke gone o tlaa humisiwa. Bona, ene yoo a nang le botshelo jo bo sa khutleng o humile.
Ammaaruri, ammaaruri, Ke a go raya, fela jaaka o eleditse mo go nna jalo go tlaa dirwa mo go wena; mme fa o eletsa, o tlaa nna mokgwa wa go dira molemo o mogolo mo tshikeng e.
Se bue sepe fa e se boikwatlhao mo tshikeng e; tshegetsa ditaelo tsa me, le go thusa go tlisa tiro ya me, go ya ka ditaelo tsa me, mme o tlaa segofadiwa.
Bona o na le neo, mme o segofetse wena ka neo ya gago. Gakologelwa e boitshepo mme e tswa kwa godimo—

Mme fa o botsisisa, o tlaa itse masaitsiweng a magolo e bile a gakgamatsa; ke gone ka moo o tla rutuntsha neo ya gago, gore o tle o bone masaitsiweng, gore o ka tlisa bontsi mo kitsong ya boammaaruri, ee, ba lemotshe phoso ya ditsela tsa bone.
Se dire gore neo ya gago e itsiwe ke bape fa e se e le bao ba e leng ba tumelo ya gago. O se tlhoke tlotlo mo dilong tse di boitshepo.

Fa o ka dira molemo, ee, mme o tswelela ka boikanyego go ya bokhutlong, o tlaa bolokwa mo bogosing jwa Modimo, se e leng kgolobogolo ga dineo tsotlhe tsa Modimo; gonne ga gona neo epe e kgolo go feta neo ya poloko.

Ammaaruri, ammaaruri, Ke a go raya, o segofaditswe ka ntlha ya se o se dirileng; gonne o botsisitse mo go nna, mme bona, gantsi jaaka o botsisitse o amogetse taelo ya Mowa wa me. Fa go ne go sa nna jalo, o ka bo o sa tla mo lefelong le o leng mo go lone mo nakong e.
Bonang, o a itse gore o botsisitse mo go nna mme Ka sedifatsa tlhaloganyo ya gago; mme jaanong Ke go bolelela dilo tseno gore o ka itse fa o sedifaditswe ka Mowa wa boammaaruri;
Ee, Ke a go bolelela, gore o ka itse gore ga go ope o sele fa e se Modimo yoo itseng dikakanyo le maikaelelo a pelo ya gago.
Ke go bolelela dilo tse jaaka bosupi mo go wena—gore mafoko kgotsa tiro e o ntseng o e kwala e e boammaaruri.
Ke gone ka moo tlhagafala; ema le motlhanka wa me Joseph, ka boikanyego, mo diemo dingwe le dingwe tse di thata tse a ka nnang mo go tsone ka ntlha ya lefoko.
Mo gakolole mo diphosong tsa gagwe, mme gape o amogele kgakololo mo go ene. O nne pelotelele; o ikgaphe o nne tekano, o nne le bopelotelele, tumelo, tsholofelo le bopelonomi.

Bona, wena o Oliver, mme ke buile le wena ka ntlha ya dikeletso tsa gago, ke gone ka moo boloka mafoko a mo pelong ya gago. O nne boikanyego le tlhaga mo go tshegetseng ditaelo tsa Modimo, mme Ke tlaa go dikaganyetsa mo matsogong a me a lorato.
Bonang, Ke nna Jeso Keresete, Morwa Modimo. Ke ne ka tla mo go bagaetsho, mme bagaetsho ba seka ba ntshola. Ke nna lesedi le le phatsimang mo lefifing, mme lefifi la seka la amogalana nalo.

Ammaaruri, ammaaruri, ke a go raya, fa o eletsa bosupi jo bongwe, busetsa mogopolo wa gago mo bosigong jo o neng wa lelela mo go nna mo pelong ya gago, gore o tle o itse mabapi le boammaaruri jwa dilo tseno.
A ga Ke a bua kagiso mo tlhaloganyong ya gago mabapi le dilo tse? Ke bosupi bofe jo bogolo jo o ka nnang le bone go feta jo bo tswang kwa Modimong?
Mme jaanong, bona, o amogetse bosupi; gonne fa ke go boleletse dilo tseo go seng motho ope a di itseng a ga o a amogela bosupi?
Mme, bona, Ke go naya neo, fa o eletsa mo go nna, go ranola, fela jaaka motlhanka wa me Joseph.
Ammaaruri, ammaaruri, Ke a go raya, gore go na le ditshupo tse di nang le efangele ya me ka bogolo, tse di ntseng di beetswe morago ka ntlha ya boikepo jwa batho;

Mme jaanong Ke a go laola, gore fa o na le dikeletso tse di molemo—keletso ya go ipeela matlotlo mo legodimong—ke gone o tlaa thusa mo go tliseng go lesedi, ka neo ya gago, dikarolo tseo tsa dikwalo tse di boitshepo tse di ntseng di fitlhilwe ka ntlha ya boikepo.

Mme jaanong, bona, Ke a go neela, mme le ene motlhanka wa me Joseph, dilotlele tsa neo e, tse di tlaa tsisang mo leseding tirelo e; mme ka melomo ya basupi ba le babedi kgotsa ba le bararo lefoko lengwe le lengwe le tlaa tlhomamisiwa.
Ammaaruri, ammaaruri, Ke a go raya, fa ba gana mafoko ame, le karolo e ya efangele ya me le tirelo, o segofetse, gonne ga ba ka ke ba dira go feta mo go wena bogolo mo go nna.
Mme fela le fa ba ka dira mo go wena le e leng jaaka ba dirile mo go nna, o segofetse, gonne o tlaa nna le nna mo kgalalelong.
Mme fa ba sa gane mafoko ame, a a tlaa tlhomamisiwang ka bopaki jo bo tlaa neelwang, ba segofetse, mme o tlaa nna le boitumelo mo leungong la ditiro tsa gago.

Ammaaruri, ammaaruri, ke a go raya, jaaka ke buile mo barutwaneng ba me, kwa ba le babedi kgotsa ba le bararo ba phuthegileng teng mo leineng la me, ka ga selo sele sengwe, bona, foo Nna ke teng mo gare ga bone—fela jalo ke mo gare ga lona.
Se boifeng go dira molemo, barwaake, gonne le fa e le eng se lo se jwalang, ke sone seo lo tlaa se robang; ke gone ka moo fa lo jwala molemo lo tlaa roba molemo e le tuelo ya lona.
Ke gone ka moo, se boifeng, letsomanyane; dirang molemo; a lefatshe le molete di le kopanele, gonne fa lo agilwe mo lefikeng la me, ga di ka ke tsa le fenya.
Bonang, ga ke lo sekise; tsamayang mme lo seka latlhola lo leofa; dirang ka boikgapho tiro e ke lo e laetseng.
Lebang kwa go nna mo kakanyong nngwe le nngwe; lo sa belaele, lo sa boife.

Bonang dintho tse di tlhabilweng mo letlhakoreng la me, le mabadi a dipekere mo diatleng tsa me le dikgato, lo nne boikanyego, tshegetsang ditaelo tsa me, mme lo tlaa rua boswa jwa bogosi jwa legodimo. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/7.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 7
chapter_summary: 1–3, Johane yoo Rategang o tlaa tshela go fitlhelela Morena a tla; 4–8, Petere, Jakobe, le Johane ba tshwere dilotlele tsa efangele.

verses.text: Mme Morena a nthaya a re: Johane, moratwa, o eletsa eng? Gonne fa o ka kopa se o se ratang, o tlaa se newa.
Mme ka re go ene: Morena, nneele thata godimo go loso, gore ke tshele le go tlisa mewa kwa go wena.
Mme Morena a re go nna: Ammaaruri, ammaaruri, Ke a go raya, gonne o eletsa seno o tlaa diega go fitlha ke tla mo kgalalelong ya me, mme o tlaa perofeta fa pele ga ditshaba, masika, diteme le batho.

Mme ka lebaka le Morena a re go Petere: Fa ke rata a diega go fitlha ke tla, e be e le eng seo go wena? Gonne o eletsa mo go nna gore a tle a tlise mewa go nna, mme wena o eletsa gore o tle ka bonako mo bogosing jwa me.
Ke a go raya, Petere, seno e ne e le keletso e e molemo; mme moratwa wa me o eleditse gore a tle a dire mo gontsi, kgotsa tiro e kgolo mo gare ga batho go gaisa se a se dirile pele.
Ee, o dirile tiro e kgolo; ka jalo ke tlaa mo dira jaaka kgabo ya molelo le modiredi wa moengele; o tlaa direla bao e tlaa nnang barua boswa jwa poloko ba ba nnang mo lefatsheng.
Mme ke tlaa go dira gore o mo direle le mokaulengwe wa gago Jakobe; mme go lona ba bararo Ke tlaa neela thata e le dilotlele tsa tirelo go fitlha ke tla.
Ammaaruri Ke a lo raya, lotlhe lo tlaa amogela go ya ka dikeletso tsa lona, gonne lotlhe lo itumelela se lo se eleditseng.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/8.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 8
chapter_summary: 1–5, Tshenolo e tla ka thata ya Mowa o o Boitshepo; 6–12, Kitso ya masaitsiweng a Modimo le thata ya go ranola dipego tsa bogologolo e tla ka tumelo.

verses.text: Oliver Cowdery, ammaruri, ammaruri, Ke a go raya, ka nnete jaaka Morena a tshidile, yo e leng Modimo wa gago le Morekolodi wa gago, fela jalo ruri o tlaa amogela kitso ya sengwe le sengwe se o tlaa se kopang ka tumelo, ka pelo e e tshepegang, o dumela gore o tlaa amogela kitso mabapi le megabo ya ditshupo tse di kgologolo, tsa bogologolo, tse dinang le dikarolo tsa lefoko la me le le boitshepo tse di builweng ka ponatshegelo ya Mowa wa me.
Ee, bona, Ke tlaa go bolelela mo tlhaloganyong ya gago le mo pelong ya gago, ka Mowa o o Boitshepo, o o tlaa tlang mo go wena le go nna mo pelong ya gago.
Jaanong, bonang, se ke Mowa wa tshenolo; bonang, se ke Mowa o Moshe a ntshitseng bana ba Iseraele ka o ne kwa Lewatleng le Lehibidu mo lefatsheng le le omeletseng.
Ke gone ka moo se ke neo ya gago; e dirise, mme o segofetse, gonne e tlaa go golola mo diatleng tsa baba ba gago, fa, gone go sa nna jalo, ba ka go bolaya le go tsisa mowa wa gago go tshenyego.
Ao!, gakologelwa mafoko ano, mme o tshegetse ditaelo tsa me. Gakologelwa, se ke neo ya gago.
Jaanong se ga se yotlhe neo ya gago; gonne o na le neo e nngwe, e leng neo ya ga Arone; bonang, e go boleletse dilo tse dintsi;
Bonang, ga gona thata enngwe, fa ese thata ya Modimo, e e ka dirang gore neo e ya ga Arone e nne le wena.

Ke gone ka moo, se tlhobaele, gonne ke neo ya Modimo; mme o tlaa e tshegetsa mo diatleng tsa gago, le go dira ditiro tse di gakgamatsang; mme ga go thata epe e e nonofileng go e tlosa mo diatleng tsa gago, gonne ke tiro ya Modimo.
Mme, ke gone ka moo, sengwe le sengwe se o tlaa se nkopang go se go bolelela ka mokgwa o, seo ke tlaa se go neela, mme o tlaa nna le kitso mabapi le sone.
Gakologelwa gore fa o sena tumelo ga o ka ke wa dira sepe; ke gone ka moo kopa ka tumelo. Se tshameke ka dilo tseno; se kope seo se o sa tshwanelang go se kopa.

Kopa gore o ka itse masitsiweng a Modimo, le gore o ka ranola le go amogela kitso go tswa mo go tsotlhe ditshupo tsa bogologolo tse di ntseng di fitlhilwe, tseo di boitshepo; mme go ya ka tumelo ya gago go tlaa dirwa mo go wena.
Bonang, ke nna yo ke e buileng, mme e ene yoo a buileng mo go wena go tswa kwa tshimologong. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/9.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 9
chapter_summary: 1–6, Dipego tse dingwe tsa bogologolo le tsone di tlaa ranolwa; 7–14, Buka ya ga Momone e ranolwa ka go ithutontsha le ka tlhomamiso ya semowa.

verses.text: Bona, Ke a go raya, morwaaka, gore gonne ga o a ranola go ya ka seo o se eleditseng mo go nna, mme wa simolola gape go kwalela motlhanka wa me, Joseph Smith, Jun., fela jalo ke thato ya me gore o ka tswelela go fitlha o wetsa tshupo e, e ke mo e neileng.
Mme ke gone, bona, Ke na le ditshupo tse dingwe tseo, tse ke tlaa go neelang thata gore o ka thusa go di ranola.
Nna pelotelele, morwaaka, gonne ke tlhalefo mo go nna, mme ga go a tshwanela gore o ka ranola ka nako eno.
Bonang, tiro e o bileditsweng go e dira ke go kwalela motlhanka wa me Joseph.
Mme, bona, ke ka ntlha ya gore ga o a tswelela jaaka o ne o simolotse, fa o simolola go ranola, gore Ke bo ke tlositse lobaka lo mo go wena.
O se ka wa ngongorega, morwaaka, gonne ke tlhalefo mo go nna gore Ke bo ke go dirile ka mokgwa o.
Bona, ga o a tlhaloganya; o gopotse gore ke ka go e neela fela, fa o ne o sa akanya sepe fa e se fela go mpotsa.

Mme, bonang, Ka re go wena, o tshwanetse gore o e sekaseke pele mo tlhaloganyong ya gago; ke gone o bo o mpotsa gore a go siame, mme fa go siame ke tlaa dira gore sehuba sa gago se tshupe mo teng; ke gone ka moo, o tlaa utlwa gore e siame.

Mme fa go sa siama ga o ka ke wa nna le maikutlo a a ntseng jalo, mme o tlaa na le tshereano ya kakanyo eo e tlaa go dirang gore o lebale selo seo se se phoso; ke gone ka moo, ga o ka ke wa kwala seo se boitshepo fa e se o se neetswe go tswa mo go nna.
Jaanong, fa o ne o itsile se o ka bo o ranotse; le fa go ntse jalo, ga go a tshwanela gore o ka ranola jaanong.
Bonang, go ne go tshwanetse fa o simolola; mme o ne wa boifa, mme nako e fetile, mme ga go a tshwanela jaanong;
Gonne, a ga o bone gore ke neetse motlhanka wa me Joseph nonofo e e lekaneng, e a dirilweng ka yone? Mme le fa e le ope wa lona yo ke mosekisitseng.
Dira selo se se ke se go laoletseng, mme o tlaa tlhogonolofala. O nne boikanyego, mme o se ineele mo thaelong.
O eme ka tlhomamo mo tirong e ke go biditseng mo go yone, mme moritshana wa tlhogo ya gago ga o kitla o latlhega, mme o tlaa tsholelediwa ka letsatsi la bofelo. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/10.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 10
chapter_summary: 1–26, Satane o kgobera batho ba ba boikepo go ganetsa tiro ya Morena; 27–33, O batla go senya mewa ya batho; 34–52, Efangele e tshwanetse go ya go Balamane le ditshaba tsotlhe ka Buka ya ga Momone; 53–63, Morena o tlaa tlhomamisa Kereke ya Gagwe le efangele ya Gagwe mo bathong; 64–70, O tlaa phutha baikwatlhai mo Kerekeng ya Gagwe mme o tlaa boloka bao ba ba obamelang.

verses.text: Jaanong, bona, Ke a go raya, gore gonne o ntsheditse mekwalo e o neng o neetswe thata go e ranola ka mokgwa wa Urime le Thamime, mo diatleng tsa monna yoo boikepo, o di latlhile.
Mme o latlhile le yone neo ya gago ka nako eo, e bile tlhaloganyo ya gago e ne ya fifala.
Le fa go ntse jalo, e buseditswe go wena gape; ke gone ka moo bona gore o boikanyego mme o tswelele go fetsa tiro e e setseng ya thanolo jaaka o e simolotse.
O se ka wa taboga kgotsa wa dira go feta bogolo go na le nonofo le mokgwa yo o neetsweng go go thatafatsa go ranola; mme nna tlhaga go ya bokhutlong.
Rapela ka metlha, gore o nne mofenyi; ee, gore o ka fenya Satane, le gore o ka falola diatla tsa batlhanka ba ga Satane bao ba tshegeditseng tiro ya gagwe.
Bonang, ba batlile go go nyeletsa; ee, le ene monna yoo neng o mo ikanya o batlile go go nyeletsa.
Mme ka lebaka le Ke rile ke monna wa moikepi, gonne o ne a batlile go tlosa dilo tse di neetsweng mo go wena; mme o batlile go senya neo ya gago.
Mme gonne o neetse mekwalo mo diatleng tsa gagwe, bona, batho ba ba boikepo ba di tsere mo go wena.
Ke gone ka moo, o di neetse, ee, seo se se neng se le boitshepo, go boikepo.
Mme, bona, Satane o tsentse mo dipelong tsa bone go fetola mafoko a o dirileng gore a kwadiwe, kgotsa a o a ranotseng, a o a duleng mo diatleng tsa gago.
Mme bona, Ke a go raya, gonne ba fetotse mafoko ao, a balega a tlhabaganye le a o a ranotseng, a o dirileng gore a kwadiwe;
Mme, ka tsela e, diabole o batlile go baya leano la boferefere, gore a senye tiro e;
Gonne o beile mo dipelong tsa bone go dira se, gore ka maaka ba ka re ba go tshwere ka mafoko a o ipayang o a ranotse.
Ammaaruri, Ke a go raya, gore ga Ke kitla ke leseletsa Satane go diragatsa togamaano ya gagwe ya bosula mo selong se.
Gonne bona, o tsentse mo dipelong tsa bone go go bona o raela Morena Modimo wa gago, mo go kopeng gore lo e ranole gape.
Mme ke gone, bonang, ba re le go akanya mo dipelong tsa bone—Re tlaa bona fa Modimo a mo neetse thata ya go ranola; mme fa go ntse jalo, o tlaa mo neela thata gape;
Mme fa Modimo a mo neela thata gape, kgotsa fa a ranola gape, kgotsa, mafoko a mangwe, fa a ka tsisa mafoko a a tshwanang, bonang, re na le a a tshwanang, mme re a fetotse;
Ke gone ka moo ga a kitla a dumalana, mme re tlaa re o akile mo mafokong a gagwe, le gore ga a na neo, le gore ga a na thata;
Ke gone ka moo re tlaa mo nyeletsa, le yone tiro e; mme re tlaa dira se gore re ka se tlhajwe ke ditlhong kwa bokhutlong, le gore re ka bona kgalalelo ya lefatshe.
Ammaaruri, ammaaruri Ke a go raya, gore Satane o na le tshwaro e kgolo mo dipelo tsa bone; o ba tlhotlheleletsa boikepo kgatlhanong le se se molemo;
Mme dipelo tsa bone di bodile, e bile di tletse boikepi le makgapha; mme ba rata lefifi bogolo go lesedi, gonne ditiro tsa bone di bosula; ke gone ka moo ga ba kitla ba mpotsa.
Satane o a ba tlhotlheletsa, gore a ka gogela mewa ya bone go tshenyego.
Mme jalo o beile leano la boferefere, o akanya go senya tiro ya Modimo; mme ke tlaa batla se mo diatleng tsa bone, mme mo go tlaa fetoga ditlhong tsa bone le tshekiso mo letsatsing la katlholo.
Ee, o tlhotlheletsa dipelo tsa bone go galefa kgatlhanong le tiro e.

Ee, o ba raya a re: Tsietsang mme lo lalele go tshwara, gore lo ka senya, bonang, se ga se molato. Mme jalo o a ba oka, le go ba bolelela gore ga se sebe go aka gore ba ka tshwara motho mo maakeng, gore ba ka mo nyeletsa.
Mme jalo o a ba oka, le go ba gogela pele go fitlha a gogobisetsa mewa ya bone mo moleteng; mme jaana o ba dira go itshwara mo serung sa bone.
Mme jaana o ya kwa godimo le kwa tlase, a thethekela mo lefatsheng, o batla go senya mewa ya batho.
Ammaaruri, ammaaruri, Ke a go raya, bohutsana mo go ene yoo akang go tsietsa gonne o gopola gore mongwe o aka go tsietsa, gonne ga ba a iteelwa ntle mo tshiamisong ya Modimo.
Jaanong, bonang, ba fetotse mafoko ano, gonne Satane o ba raya a re: O le tsieditse—mme jalo o ba okela go dira boikepo, go go bona o raela Morena Modimo wa gago.
Bonang, Ke a go raya, gore o se kitla o ranola gape mafoko ao a a duleng mo diatleng tsa gago;

Gonne, bona, ga ba kitla ba diragatsa di togamaano tsa bone tsa bosula mo go akeng kgatlhanong le mafoko ao. Gonne, bona, fa o ka tsisa mafoko a a tshwanang ba tlaa re o ipeile go ranola, mme o ikganeditse.
Mme, bona, ba tlaa anamisa se, mme Satane o tlaa thatafatsa dipelo tsa batho go ba tlhotlheleletsa go le galefela, gore ba se kitla ba dumela mafoko a me.
Mme jalo Satane o akanya go gatelela bopaki jwa gago mo tshikeng e, gore tiro e se ka ya tla mo tshikeng e.
Mme bona, seno ke tlhalefo, mme gonne ke go supetsa tlhalefo, le go go neela ditaelo mabapi le dilo tse, se o tlaa se dirang, se se bontshe lefatshe go fitlhelela o fetsa tiro ya thanolo.
Se gakgamalele gore Ke rile go wena: Seno ke tlhalefo, se e supe mo lefatsheng—gonne Ke buile, se e supe mo lefatsheng, gore o ka dibelwa.
Bonang, ga Ke reye gore ga o kitla o e supetsa basiami;

Mme jaaka o sa ka ke ka metlha wa atlhola mosiami, kgotsa jaaka o sa ka ke ka metlha wa bolela moikepi go tswa mo mosiaming, ke gone ka moo ke a go raya, didimala go fitlha ke tlaa bona go lebane go dira tsotlhe dilo go itsiwe mo lefatsheng mabapi le ntlha e.
Mme jaanong, ammaruri ka re go wena, polelo ya dilo tseo tse le di kwadileng, e e duleng mo diatleng tsa gago, e gabilwe mo dipapetlaneng tsa ga Nifae;
Ee, mme o gakologelwa gore go ne go twe mo mekwalong e o gore polelo e e kgethegileng e ne e neetswe ya dilo tse mo dipapetlaneng tsa ga Nifae.
Mme jaanong, gonne polelo e e gabilweng mo dipapetlaneng tsa ga Nifae e e kgethegileng mabapi le dilo tse, mo tlhalefong ya me, ke tlaa di tlisa mo kitsong ya batho mo polelong e—
Ke gone ka moo, o tlaa ranola megabo e e mo dipapetlaneng tsa ga Nifae, go ya tlase fela go fitlha kwa go buseng ga ga kgosi Benjamene, kgotsa go fitlha fa o ranotseng, mo o go beileng;
Mme bona, o tlaa e anamisa jaaka pego ya ga Nifae; mme jalo ke tlaa gamaregisa bao ba fetotseng mafoko a me.
Ga Ke kitla ke leseletsa gore ba ka senya tiro ya me; ee, Ke tlaa ba bontsha gore tlhalefo ya me e kgolo go feta boferefere jwa ga diabole.
Bonang, ba na le karolwana fela, kgotsa khutshwafatso ya pego ya ga Nifae.

Bonang, go na le dilo di le dintsi tse di kwadilweng mo dipapetlaneng tsa ga Nifae tse di latlhelang dipono tse di kgolo mo efangeleng ya me; ke gone ka moo, ke tlhalefo ya me gore o ranole karolwana e ya ntlha ya megabo ya ga Nifae, mme o e romele mo tirong e.

Mme, bonang, tiro yotlhe e e setseng e na le dikarolo tsotlhe tseo tsa efangele ya me tse baperofeti ba me ba ba boitshepo, ee, le bone barutwana ba me, ba eleditse mo dithapelong tsa bone go ka tla mo bathong ba.
Mme ka re go bone, gore go ka neelwa mo go bone go ya ka tumelo ya bone mo dithapelong tsa bone;

Ee, mme se e ne e le tumelo ya bone—gore efangele ya me, e ke ba e neetseng gore ba tle ba e rere mo malatsing a bone, e ka tla mo bakaulengwe ba bone Balamane, mme le bone le botlhe ba ba nnileng Balamane ka ntlha ya boingaodi jwa bone.
Jaanong, se ga se sotlhe—tumelo ya bone mo dithapelong tsa bone e ne e le gore efangele e e tshwanetse go itsiwe le yone, fa gone go kgonega gore ditshaba tse dingwe di ka rua lefatshe le;
Mme jaana ba ne ba tlogela tshegofatso mo lefatsheng mo dithapelong tsa bone, gore mongwe le mongwe yoo a ka dumelang mo efangeleng e mo lefatsheng le a tle a nne le botshelo jo bo sa khutleng;
Ee, gore a ka gololesega go yotlhe le fa e le e fe tshaba, lotso, teme, kgotsa batho ba ba ka nnang.

Mme jaanong, bonang, go yeng ka tumelo ya bone mo dithapelong tsa bone ke tlaa tsisa karolo e ya efangele ya me mo kitsong ya batho ba me. Bonang, ga ke e tsise go senya seo ba se amogetseng, mme go se thatafatsa.
Mme ka ntlha e ke rile: Fa tshika e e sa thatafatse dipelo tsa yone, ke tlaa tlhomamisa kereke ya me mo gareng ga bone.
Jaanong ga ke bue se go senya kereke ya me, mme ke bua se go thatafatsa kereke ya me;
Ke gone ka moo, mongwe le mongwe yo e leng wa kereke ya me ga a tlhoke go boifa, gonne ba ba ntseng jalo ba tlaa ja boswa jwa bogosi jwa legodimo.

Mme ke bone ba ba sa mpoifeng, le fa e le go tshegetsa ditaelo tsa me mme ba ikagela dikereke go boelwa, ee, le botlhe bao ba dirang boikepo le go aga bogosi jwa ga diabole—ee, ammaruri, ammaruri, ke a go raya, gore ke bone bao ke tlaa ba feretlhang, mme ke ba dire gore ba rorome le go ba tshikinya mo gare.
Bonang, e nna Jeso Keresete, Morwa Modimo. Ke tsile mo go bagaetsho, mme bagaetsho ba seka ba ntshola.
Ke lesedi le le phatshimang mo lefifing, mme lefifi le sa amogalana na lo.
Ke nna yoo ke rileng—Dinku tse dingwe ke na le tsone tse eseng tsa letsomane le—go barutwana ba me, mme botlhe ga ba a tlhaloganya.
Mme ke tlaa bontsha batho ba gore ke ne ke na le dinku tse dingwe, le gore e ne e lekalana la ntlo ya ga Jakobe;
Mme Ke tlaa tlisa mo leseding ditiro tsa bone tse di gakgamatsa, tse ba di dirileng mo leineng la me;

Ee, mme ke tlaa tlisa mo leseding efangele ya me e ba neng ba e diretswe, mme, bonang, ga ba kitla ba latola seo se lo se amogetseng, mme ba tlaa se thatafatsa, mme ba tlise go lesedi dintlha tsa boammaaruri tsa thuto ya me, ee, le thuto fela e e mo go nna.

Mme se ke se dira gore Ke ka tlhomamisa efangele ya me, gore go seka ga nna le dikganetsano tse di kalo; ee, Satane o tlhotlheletsa dipelo tsa batho go ganetsana mabapi le dintlha tsa thuto ya me; mme mo dilong tseno ba dira phoso, gonne ba lwantsha dikwalo tse di boitshepo mme ga ba di tlhaloganye.
Ke gone ka moo, ke tlaa ba phuthololela masaitsiweng a magolo a;
Gonne, bonang, ke tlaa ba phutha jaaka koko e phutha dikokwana tsa yone mo diphukeng tsa yone, fa ba se kitla ba thatafatsa dipelo tsa bone;
Ee, fa ba ka tla, ba ka tla, mme ba tlhakanela metsi a botshelo ka kgololesego.
Bonang, se ke thuto ya me—mongwe le mongwe yoo ikwatlhayang mme a tle mo go nna, ene yoo ke kereke ya me.
Mongwe le mongwe yoo bolelang go feta kgotsa go le go nnye bogolo go se, yoo ga se wa me, mme o kgatlhanong le nna, ke gone ka moo e seng wa kereke ya me.

Mme jaanong, bonang, mongwe le mongwe yoo eleng wa kereke ya me, mme a itshoka mo kerekeng ya me go ya bokhutlong, ene yoo Ke tlaa mo tlhomamisa mo lefikeng la me, mme dikgoro tsa molete ga di kitla di mo fenya.
Mme jaanong, gakologelwang mafoko a ene yo e leng botshelo le lesedi la lefatshe, Morekolodi wa lona, Morena wa lona le Modimo wa lona. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/11.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 11
chapter_summary: 1–6, Badiredi mo tshimong ya mofine ba tlaa fiwa poloko; 7–14, Batla tlhalefo, bolela boikwatlhao, tshepha mo Moyeng; 15–22, Tshegetsa ditaelo, mme o ithute lefoko la Morena; 23–27, Se latole Mowa wa tshenolo le wa seperofeti; 28–30, Bao ba amogelang Keresete ba nna barwa ba Modimo.

verses.text: Tiro e kgolo e bile e gakgamatsa e tloga e tla mo gare ga bana ba batho.

Bonang, Ke nna Modimo; tlhwaelang lefoko la me tsebe, leo le le tshelang e bile le le thata, le le bogale go feta tshaka e e magale mabedi, go kgaoganya ka bogare ditokololo gotlhe le moko; ke gone ka moo tlhokomelang mafoko a me.

Bonang, tshimo e tshweu gale e etleeleditswe go robiwa, ke gone ka moo, yoo eletsang go roba, a a latlhele sekele ka maatla a gagwe, mme a robe nako e sale teng, gore a kgone go bolokela mowa wa gagwe poloko ya bosenang bokhutlo mo bogosing jwa Modimo.
Ee, ope fela yoo tlaa latlhelelang sekele ya gagwe mme a roba, ene yoo o bilediwa tiro ya Modimo.
Ke gone ka moo, fa o ka kopa mo go nna o tlaa amogela; fa o ka kokota o tlaa bulelwa.
Jaanong, jaaka o kopile, bonang, Ke a go raya, tshegetsa ditaelo tsa me, mme o batle go tsisa le go tlhoma maikemisetso a Sione;
Se batle mahumo fa e se tlhalefo, mme bona, masaitsiweng a Modimo a tlaa go phuthologela, mme ke gone o tlaa dirwang mohumi. Bonang, yoo nang le botshelo jo bo sa khutleng o humile.
Ammaruri, ammaruri, Ke a go raya, le jaaka o eletsa mo go nna jalo go tlaa diragadiwa go wena; mme, fa o eletsa, o tlaa nna mokgwa wa go dira molemo o montsi mo tshikeng e.
Se bue sepe fa e se boikwatlhao mo tshikeng e; tshegetsa ditaelo tsa me, mme o thuse go tsisa tiro ya me, go ya ka ditaelo tsa me, mme o tlaa segofadiwa.
Bonang, o na le neo, kgotsa o tlaa nna le neo fa o eletsa mo go nna ka tumelo, ka pelo e e tshephegang, o dumela mo thateng ya ga Jeso Keresete, kgotsa mo thateng e e buang mo go wena;
Gonne, bonang, Ke nna yo ke buang; bonang, Ke nna lesedi le le phatsimang mo lefifing, mme ka thata ya me ke lo neela mafoko a.
Mme jaanong, ammaruri, ammaruri ke a go raya, baya tshepo ya gago mo Moyeng o o isang go dira molemo—ee, go dira ka tshiamo, go tsamaya ka boikokobetso, go atlhola ka tshiamo; mme se ke Mowa wa me.
Ammaruri, ammaruri, Ke a go raya, Ke tlaa go abela Mowa wa me, o o tlaa sedifatsang tlhaloganyo ya gago, o o tlaa tlatsang mowa wa gago ka boitumelo;
Mme ke gone o tlaa itse, kgotsa ka se o tlaa itse, dilo tsotlhe le fa e le eng se o se eletsang mo go nna, tse e leng tsa dilo tsa tshiamo, mo tumelong o dumela mo go nna gore o tlaa amogela.
Bonang, Ke a go laola gore ga o tlhoke go gopola gore o bileditswe go rera go fitlha o bidiwa.
Ema ka sebakanyana, go fitlha o nna le lefoko la me, lefika la me, kereke ya me, le efangele ya me, gore o ka itse ka ruri thuto tsa me.
Mme ke gone, bonang, go ya ka di keletso tsa gago, ee, e bong go ya ka tumelo ya gago go tlaa dirwa mo go wena.
Tshegetsa ditaelo tsa me, didimala; kokotlelang go Mowa wa me;
Ee, ngaparela ka pelo yotlhe ya gago, gore o ka thusa go tlisa mo leseding dilo tseo tse go builweng ka tsone—ee, thanolo ya tiro ya me, nna pelotelele go fitlha o e fetsa.
Bonang, seno ke tiro ya gago, go tshegetsa ditaelo tsa me, ee, ka otlhe maatla a gago, tlhaloganyo le nonofo.

Se batle go bolela lefoko la me, mme batla pele go itse lefoko la me, mme ke gone loleme la gago lo tlaa hunologa, ke gone, fa o eletsa, o tlaa nna le Mowa wa me le lefoko la me, ee, thata ya Modimo go tlhotlheletsa batho.

Mme jaanong didimala; ithute lefoko la me le le ileng mo gare ga bana ba batho, mme le lone lefoko la me o le ithute le le tlaa tlang mo gare ga bana ba batho, kgotsa a jaanong a ranolwang, ee, go fitlha o amogela otlhe a Ke tlaa a neelang go bana ba batho mo tshikeng e, mme ke gone dilo tsotlhe di tlaa okelediwa moo.
Bona o Hyrum, morwaake, batla bogosi jwa Modimo, mme dilo tsotlhe di tlaa okediwa go ya go seo se se siameng.
Aga mo lefikeng la me, le e leng efangele ya me;
Se latole Mowa wa tshenolo, le fa e le Mowa wa seperofeti, gonne bohutsana go ene yoo latolang dilo tse;
Ke gone ka moo, boloka mo pelong ya gago go fitlha nako e e mo tlhalefong ya me gore o tsamaele pele.
Bonang, Ke bua le botlhe ba ba nang le dikeletso tse di molemo, mme ba latlhetse sekele tsa bone go roba.
Bonang, Ke nna Jeso Keresete, Morwa Modimo. Ke nna botshelo le lesedi la lefatshe.
Ke nna ene yoo a tsileng mo go bagaetsho mme bagaetsho ba se ka ba ntshola;
Mme ammaaruri, ammaaruri, Ke a go raya, gore jaaka ba le bantsi ba ntshotse, go bone ke tlaa neela thata go nna bana ba Modimo, e bong go bone ba ba dumelang mo leineng la me. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/12.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 12
chapter_summary: 1–6, Badiredi mo tshimong ya mofine ba tlaa fiwa poloko; 7–9, Botlhe ba ba eletsang mme ba atlegile ba ka thusa mo tirong ya Morena.

verses.text: Tiro e kgolo e bile e gakgamatsa e tloga e tla mo gare ga bana ba batho.

Bonang, Ke nna Modimo, tlhwaelang lefoko la me tsebe, leo le bonako e bile le le thata, le le bogale go feta tshaka e e magale mabedi, go kgaoganya ka bogare ditokololo tsotlhe le moko; ka jalo tlhwaelang lefoko la me tsebe.

Bonang, tshimo e tsweu gale e etleeleditswe go robiwa, ka jalo, yoo eletsang go roba, a a latlhele sekele ka maatla a gagwe, mme a robe nako e sale teng, gore a kgone go bolokela mowa wa gagwe poloko ya bosenang bokhutlo mo bogosing jwa Modimo.
Ee, ope fela yoo tlaa latlhelang sekele ya gagwe le go roba, ke ene yoo bileditsweng tiro ya Modimo.
Ke gone ka moo, fa o ka kopa mo go nna o tlaa amogela; fa o kokota o tlaa bulelwa.
Jaanong, jaaka o kopile, bona, ke a go raya, tshegetsa ditaelo tsa me, mme o batle go tsisa le go tlhomamisa ntlha ya Sione.
Bonang, Ke bua mo go wena, le mo go bone botlhe ba ba nang le dikeletso go tlisa le go tlhomamisa tiro e;

Mme ga go ope yoo ka thusang mo tirong e fa e se fela a ikokobetsa e bile a tletse lorato, a na le tumelo, tsholofelo, le bopelonomi, a le boikgapho mo dilong tsotlhe, le fa e le eng se tlaa neelwang mo tlhokomelong ya gagwe.
Bonang, Ke lesedi le botshelo jwa lefatshe, yoo ke buang mafoko ano, ke gone ka moo tlhokomela ka maatla, mme ke gone o biditswe. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/13.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 13
chapter_summary: Dilotlele le dithata tsa Boperesiti jwa ga Arone di bewa pele.

verses.text: Mo go lona bakaulengwe ba me, mo leineng la Mesia ke tlhoma Boperesiti jwa ga Arone, jo bo tshegeditseng dilotlele tsa bodiredi jwa baengele, le tsa efangele ya boikwatlhao, le ya kolobetso ka go nwetswa go phimolo ya dibe; mme se ga se kitla se tsewa gape go tswa mo lefatsheng, go fitlhelela barwa ba ga Lefi ba isa gape setlhabelo go Morena mo tshiamong.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/14.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 14
chapter_summary: 1–6, Badiredi mo tshimong ya mofine ba tlaa fiwa poloko; 7–8, Botshelo jo bo sa khutleng ke neo e kgolo go feta tsotlhe dineo tsa Modimo; 9–11, Keresete o bopile magodimo le lefatshe.

verses.text: Tiro e kgolo e bile e gakgamatsang e tloga e tla go bana ba batho.

Bonang, Ke nna Modimo; tlhokomela lefoko la me, le le tshelang le le thata, le le bogale go feta tshaka e e magale mabedi, go kgaoganya ka bogare ditokololo le moko; ke gone ka moo tlhokomela lefoko la me.

Bonang, tshimo e setse e le tsweu go robiwa; ke gone ka moo, a yoo a eletsang go roba, a latlhele sekele ka thata ya gagwe, mme a robe nako e sale teng, gore a ka ipolokela Mowa wa gagwe poloko ya bosenang bokhutlo mo bogosing jwa Modimo.
Ee, le fa e le mang yoo a latlhelelang sekele ya gagwe mme a roba, ene yoo o biditswe mo Modimong.
Ke gone ka moo, fa o ka kopa go nna o tlaa amogela; fa o kokota o tlaa bulelwa.
Batla go tsisa le go tlhomamisa Sione wa me. Tshegetsa ditaelo tsa me mo dilong tsotlhe.
Mme, fa o tshegetsa ditaelo tsa me le go itshoka go ya bokhutlong o tlaa nna le botshelo jo bo sa khutleng, neo e e leng kgolo go feta tsotlhe dineo tsa Modimo.

Mme go tlaa diragala, gore fa o ka kopa Rara mo leineng la me, ka tumelo o dumela, o tlaa amogela Mowa o o Boitshepo, yoo neelang puo, gore o ka ema jaaka mosupi wa dilo tse o tlaa di utlwang le go di bona, mme le gone gore o ka bolela boikwatlhao go tshika e.
Bonang, Ke nna Jeso Keresete, Morwa Modimo yoo o tshelang, yo o bopileng magodimo le lefatshe, lesedi le le ka sekeng le fitlhege mo lefifing;
Ke gone, Ke tshwanetse go tlisa botlalo jwa efangele go tswa go Baditshaba go ntlo ya Iseraele.
Mme bonang, wena o David, mme o bileditswe go thusa; selo se fa o se dira, mme o le boikanyego, o tlaa segofadiwa semowa le ka lobaka lono fela, mme tuelo ya gago e tlaa nna kgolo. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/15.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 15
chapter_summary: 1–2, Letsogo la Morena le okame lefatshe lotlhe; 3–6, Go rera efangele le go boloka mewa ke selo sa tlhwatlhwa e kgolo.

verses.text: Utlwa, motlhanka wa me Johane, mme o reetse mafoko a ga Jeso Keresete, Morena le Morekolodi wa gago.
Gonne bona, ke bua le wena ka bogale le ka thata, gonne letsogo la me le godimo ga lefatshe lotlhe.
Mme ke tlaa go bolelela seo se motho ope a sa se itseng fa e se nna le wena fela—
Gonne ka nako tse dintsi o eleditse mo go nna go itse seo se ka nnang molemo bogolo mo go wena.
Bona, o segofetse ka ga selo se, le go bua mafoko a me a ke go a neetse go ya ka ditaelo tsa me.

Mme jaanong, bona, Ke a go raya, gore selo se se tlaa nnang molemo bogolo go wena e tlaa nna go bolela boikwatlhao go batho ba, gore o ka tlisa mewa go nna, gore o ka bona tapologo le bone mo bogosing jwa ga Rara. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/16.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 16
chapter_summary: 1–2, Seatla sa Morena se fa godimo ga lefatshe lotlhe; 3–6, Go rera efangele le go boloka mewa ke selo se se tlhwatlhwa kgolo.

verses.text: Utlwa, motlhanka wa me Petere, mme o reetse mafoko a ga Jeso Keresete, Morena le Morekolodi wa gago.
Gonne bona, Ke bua le wena ka bogale le ka thata, gonne letsogo la me le godimo ga lefatshe lotlhe.
Mme ke tlaa go bolelela seo se motho ope a sa se itseng fa e se nna le wena fela—
Gonne ka nako tse dintsi o eleditse mo go nna go itse seo se ka nnang molemo bogolo mo go wena.
Bona, o segofetse ka ga selo se, le go bua mafoko a me a Ke go a netseng go ya ka ditaelo tsa me.

Mme jaanong, bona, Ke a go raya, gore selo se se tlaa nnang molemo bogolo go wena e tlaa nna go bolela boikwatlhao go batho ba, gore o ka tlisa mewa go nna, gore o ka bona tapologo le bone mo bogosing jwa ga Rara. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/17.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 17
chapter_summary: 1–4, Ka tumelo Basupi ba Bararo ba tlaa bona dipapetlana le tse dingwe dilwana tse di boitshepo; 5–9, Keresete o fa bopaki jwa bomodimo jwa Buka ya ga Momone.

verses.text: Bonang, Ke a lo raya, gore lo tshwanetse go ikaega ka lefoko la me, se fa lo se dira ka boikaelelo jwa pelo jo bo tletseng, lo tlaa nna le pono ya dipapetlana, mme le yone ya seiphemelo sehubeng, tshaka ya ga Labane, Urime le Thamime, tseo di neng di neetswe mokaulengwe wa gago Jarete mo thabeng, fa a ne a bua le Morena ba lebane, le dikaedi tsa dikgakgamatso tse di neng di neetswe Lihae fa ba le mo nageng, mo letshitshing la Lewatle le Lehibidu.
Mme ke ka tumelo tsa lona gore lo tlaa amogela pono ya tsone, e leng ka tumelo eo e baperofeti ba bagologolo ba neng ba na nayo.
Mme morago ga gore lo amogele tumelo, e bile lo di bone ka matlho a lona, lo tlaa fa bopaki jwa tsone, ka thata ya Modimo;
Mme se lo tlaa se dira gore motlhanka wa me Joseph Smith, Jun., a se ka a nyelediwa, gore ke ka diragatsa maikaelelo a me a tshiamo go bana ba batho mo tirong e.
Mme lo tlaa fa bopaki gore lo di bone, fela jaaka motlhanka wa me Joseph Smith, Jun., a di bone; gonne ke ka thata ya me gore a bo a di bone, mme ke ka gonne o na le tumelo.
Mme o ranotse buka, e bong karolo eo e ke mo e laoletseng, mme jaaka Morena wa lona le Modimo wa lona a tshedile e boammaaruri.
Ke gone, lo amogetse thata e e tshwanang, le tumelo e e tshwanang, le neo e e tshwanang jaaka ene;

Mme fa lo dira ditaelo tseno tsa me tsa bofelo, tse ke lo di neetseng, dikgoro tsa dihele ga di kitla di lo fenya; gonne tshegofatso ya me e lo lekane, mme lo tlaa tsholeletswa kwa godimo ka letsatsi la bofelo.
Mme Nna, Jeso Keresete, Morena wa lona le Modimo wa lona, ke le boleletse, gore ke tle ke tlise maikaelelo a me a tshiamo go bana ba batho. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/18.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 18
chapter_summary: 1–5, Dikwalo tse di Boitshepo di supa gore go agiwa jang Kereke; 6–8, Lefatshe le golela boleong; 9–16, Boleng jwa mewa ya batho bo bogolo; 17–25, Go amogela poloko, batho ba tshwanelwa ke go amogela leina la ga Keresete; 26–36, Pitso le thomo ya ba ba Lesome le bobedi di a senolwa; 37–39, Oliver Cowdery le David Whitmer ba tshwanetse go batla ba ba Lesome le Bobedi; 40–47, Go amogela poloko, batho ba tshwanetse go ikwatlhaya, ba kolobetswe, le go tshegetsa ditaelo.

verses.text: Jaanong, bonang, gonne ka selo seo, motlhanka wa me Oliver Cowdery, a eletsang go se itse mo go nna, ke go naya mafoko ano:
Bonang, ke bonaditse mo go wena, ka Mowa wa me mo makgetlhong a mantsi, gore dilo tse o di kwadileng di boammaaruri; ke gone o a itse gore di boammaaruri.
Mme fa o itse gore di boammaaruri, bona, Ke go neela taelo, gore o ikaege ka dilo tse di kwadilweng;
Gonne mo go tsone go dilo tsotlhe tse di kwadilweng mabapi le motheo wa kereke ya me, efangele ya me, ga mmogo le lefika la me.
Ke gone, fa o agela kereke ya me, mo motheong wa efangele ya me le lefika la me, dikgoro tsa molete ga di kitla di lo fenya.
Bonang, lefatshe le golela boikepong; mme go tlhokega gore bana ba batho ba tlhotlhelelediwe boikwatlhao, gotlhe Baditshaba le bone ba ntlo ya Iseraele.
Ke gone, jaaka o kolobeditswe ka diatla tsa motlhanka wa me Joseph Smith, Jun., go ya ka seo se ke se mo laetseng, o diragaditse selo se ke se mo laetseng.

Mme jaanong, se gakgamalele gore Ke mmileditse boikaelelo ja me, boikaelelo jo bo itsiweng mo go nna; ke gone, fa a nna tlhaga mo go tshegetseng ditaelo tsa me o tlaa segofalediwa botshelo jo bo sa khutleng; mme leina la gagwe ke Joseph.

Mme jaanong, Oliver Cowdery, ke bua le wena, ga mmogo le David Whitmer, ka mokgwa wa taelo; gonne, bonang, ke laela batho botlhe gongwe le gongwe go ikwatlhaya, mme ke bua le wena, jaaka ke ne ka dira go moaposetole wa me Paulo, gonne lo biditswe ka pitso e e tshwanang le e a neng a biditswe ka yone.
Gakologelwa boleng jwa mewa ya batho bo botlhokwa mo ponong ya Modimo;
Gonne, bonang, Morena Morekolodi wa gago o bogile loso mo nameng; ka jalo o bogile setlhabi sa batho botlhe, gore batho botlhe ba tle ba ikwatlhae mme ba tle go ene.
Mme o tsogile gape mo baswing, gore a tle a tsise batho botlhe mo go ene, mo melawaneng ya boikwatlhao.
Mme boitumelo jwa gagwe bo bogolo jang mo moweng yo o ikwatlhayang!
Ke gone, lo bileditswe go bolela boikwatlhao go batho ba.

Mme fa e le jalo gore lo ka dira malatsi otlhe a lona mo go goeng boikwatlhao go batho ba, mme lwa tlisa, le fa e le mowa o le mongwe go nna, boitumelo jwa lona le ene bo tlaa nna bogolo jang mo bogosing jwa ga Rara!

Mme jaanong, fa boitumelo jwa lona bo le bogolo ka mowa o le mongwe yo le o tsisitseng mo go nna mo bogosing jwa ga Rara, mme boitumelo jwa lona bo tlaa nna bogolo jang fa lo ka tlisa mewa e mentsi go nna!
Bonang, lo na le efangele ya me fa pele ga lona, le lefika la me, le poloko ya me.
Kopang Rraetsho mo leineng la me ka tumelo, lo dumela gore lo tlaa amogela, mme lo tlaa nna le Mowa o o Boitshepo, o o bonatshang dilo tsotlhe tse di tshwanetseng go bana ba batho.
Mme fa lo sena tumelo, tsholofelo, le lorato, ga lo ke lo dire sepe.
Se ganetsanyeng le kereke epe, fa e se fela e le kereke ya ga diabole.
Amogela leina la ga Keresete, mme o bue boammaaruri ka tekano.
Mme jaaka ba bantsi ba ka ikwatlhaya le go kolobediwa mo leineng la me, le e leng Jeso Keresete, le go itshoka go ya bokhutlong, bone bao ba tlaa bolokwa.
Bonang, Jeso Keresete ke leina le le neetsweng ke Rara, mme ga go leina lepe le le neetsweng leo motho a ka bolokwang ka lone;
Ke gone, batho botlhe ba tshwanetse go amogela leina le le neetsweng ke Rara, gonne ka leina leo ba tlaa bitswa ka letsatsi la bofelo;
Ke gone, fa ba sa itse leina le ba bidiwang ka lone, ga ba ka ke ba nna le bonno mo bogosing jwa ga Rara.
Mme jaanong, bonang, go na le ba bangwe ba ba bileditsweng go bolela efangele ya me, gotlhe go Baditshaba le go Bajuta;

Ee, e leng ba ba Lesome le bobedi, mme bone ba ba Lesome le bobedi ba ba tlaa nna barutwana ba me, mme ba tlaa amogela leina la me; e bile ba ba Lesome le bobedi ke bone ba ba tlaa eletsang go amogela leina la me ka boikaelelo jo bo tletseng jwa pelo.
Mme fa ba eletsa go amogela leina la me ka boikaelelo jo botletseng jwa pelo, ba bilediwa go lefatshe lotlhe go rera efangele go dibopiwa tsotlhe.
Mme bona ke bone ba ba tlhomilweng mo go nna go kolobetsa mo leineng la me, go ya ka seo se se kwadilweng;
Mme lo na le se se kwadilweng fa pele ga lona; ke gone, lo tshwanetse go se dira go ya ka mafoko a a kwadilweng.
Mme jaanong Ke bua mo go lona, ba ba Lesome le bobedi—Bonang, tshegofatso ya me e lo lekane; lo tshwanetse go tsamaya ka thokgamo fa pele ga me mme lo sa dire sebe.

Mme, bonang, lo bone ba ba tlhomilweng mo go nna go tlhoma baperesiti le baruti; go bolela efangele ya me, go ya ka thata ya Mowa o o Boitshepo o o leng mo go lona, le go ya ka dipitso le dineo tsa Modimo go batho;
Mme Nna, Jeso Keresete, Morena wa lona le Modimo wa lona, ke e buile.
Mafoko ano ga se a batho le fa e le a motho, mme ame; ke gone, lo tlaa paka gore ke ame mme ga se a motho;
Gonne ke lentswe la me le le a buang go lona; gonne a newa ka Mowa wa me, mme ka thata ya me lo ka balelana; mme fa e ne e se ka thata ya me lo ka bo lo sena nao;
Ke gone, lo ka paka gore lo utlwile lentswe la me, le go itse mafoko ame.
Mme jaanong, bona, Ke a go naya, Oliver Cowdery, le mo go ene David Whitmer, gore le batle ba ba Lesome le bobedi, ba ba tlaa nnang le dikeletso tse ke buileng ka tsone;
Mme ka dikeletso tsa bone le ditiro tsa bone lo tlaa ba itse.
Mme fa lo ba bone lo tlaa ba bontsha dilo tseno.
Mme lo tlaa wela tlase mme lo obamele Rara mo leineng la me.
Mme lo tshwanetse go rerela lefatshe, lo re: Lo tshwanetse go ikwatlhaya le go kolobediwa, mo leineng la ga Jeso Keresete;
Gonne batho botlhe ba tshwanetse go ikwatlhaya le go kolobediwa, mme e seng fela banna, mme basadi, le bana ba ba gorogileng mo dingwageng tsa boikarabelelo.
Mme jaanong, morago ga go amogela se, lo tshwanetse go tshegetsa ditaelo tsa me mo dilong tsotlhe;

Mme ka diatla tsa lona Ke tlaa dira tiro e e gakgamatsang mo gareng ga bana ba batho, mo go tlhotlheletseng ba bantsi ka dibe tsa bone, gore ba ka tla go boikwatlhao, le gore ba ka tla go bogosi jwa ga Rara.
Ke gone, ditshegofatso tse Ke lo di neetseng di godimo ga dilo tsotlhe.
Mme morago ga gore o amogela se, fa o ka se tshegetse ditaelo tsa me o ka se bolokwe mo bogosing jwa ga Rara.
Bona, Nna, Jeso Keresete, Morena wa gago le Modimo wa gago, le Morekolodi wa gago, ka thata ya Mowa wa me ke a buile. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/19.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 19
chapter_summary: 1–3, Keresete o na le thata yotlhe; 4–5, Batho botlhe ba tshwanetse go ikwatlhaya go sa nneng jalo ba tlaa boga; 6–12, Kotlhao ya bosakhutleng ke kotlhao ya Modimo; 13–20, Keresete o bogisegetse botlhe, gore ba seka ba bogisega fa ba ka ikwatlhaya; 21–28, Rerang efangele ya boikwatlhao; 29–41, Bolelang dikgang tse di molemo.

verses.text: Ke nna Alefa le Omega, Keresete Morena, ee, Ke nna ene, tshimologo le bokhutlo, Morekolodi wa lefatshe.
Nna, ke diragaditse le go wetsa go rata ga ene yo Ke leng wa gagwe, e leng Rara, mabapi le nna—le jaaka ke dirile se gore Ke tle ke ipeele dilo tsotlhe mo taolong ya me—

Ke tshegeditse thata yotlhe, le e leng go nyeletsa Satane le ditiro tsa gagwe kwa bokhutlong jwa lefatshe, le katlholo e kgolo ya letsatsi la bofelo, e Ke tlaa e fetisetsang mo banni ba lone, go atlhola motho mongwe le mongwe go yeng ka ditiro tsa gagwe le ditiragatso tse a di dirileng.
Mme ruri motho mongwe le mongwe o tshwanetse go ikwatlhaya kgotsa a bogisega, gonne Nna, Modimo, ke bosakhutleng.
Ke gone, ga Ke fetole dikatlholo tse ke tlaa di diragatsang, mme bohutsana bo tlaa tswela pele, kuruetso, le go huranya ga meno, ee, go bao ba ba tlaa fitlhelwang mo seatleng sa me sa molema.
Le fa go ntse jalo, ga go a kwadiwa gore ga gona go kitla go nna le bokhutlo go tlhokofatso e, mme go kwadilwe tlhokofatso ya bosakhutleng.

Gape, go kwadilwe khutsego ya bosakhutleng; ke gone e itsege go feta bogolo go dikwalo tse di boitshepo tse dingwe, gore e tle e dire mo dipelong tsa bana ba batho, gotlhelele ka ga kgalalelo ya leina la me.
Ke gone, Ke tlaa lo tlhalosetsa bosaitseweng jo, gonne go lebane mo go lona go itse fela jaaka baaposetole ba me.
Ke bua le lona bao ba itshenketsweng mo selong se, fela ka bongwe, gore lo ka tsena mo tapologo ya me.

Gonne, bonang, bosaitseweng jwa poifo modimo, bo bogolo jang! Gonne, bonang, Ke nna bosakhutleng, mme kotlhao e e neetsweng go tswa mo seatleng sa me ke kotlhao ya bosakhutleng, gonne Bosakhutleng ke leina la me. Ke gone—
Kotlhao ya bosakhutleng ke kotlhao ya Modimo.
Kotlhao ya bosakhutleng ke kotlhao ya Modimo.
Ke gone, Ke go laela go ikwatlhaya, le go tshegetsa ditaelo tsa me tse o di amogetseng ka seatla sa motlhanka wa me Joseph Smith, Jun., mo leineng la me;
Mme ke ka thata e e maatla ya me gore o bo o di amogetse;

Ke gone ka moo Ke go laela go ikwatlhaya—ikwatlhaye, e sere kgotsa Ka lo itaya ka thobane ya molomo wa me, le ka tshakgalo ya me, le ka bogale jwa me, mme dipogisego tsa lona di nne botlhoko—botlhoko jang ga lo itse, mo go tseneletseng jang ga lo itse, jo bo thata jang go bo itshokela ga lo itse.
Gonne bonang, Nna, Modimo, ke bogisegetse dilo tseno go botlhe, gore ba ka se bogisege fa ba ka ikwatlhaya;
Mme fa ba ka se ikwatlhae ba tshwanetse go bogisega fela jaaka Nna;

Pogisego e e ntirileng, e bong Modimo, mogolo wa botlhe, go roroma ka ntlha ya setlhabi, le go tshologa madi ka photlha nngwe le nngwe, le go bogisega gotlhe mo mmeleng le moyeng—le gore Ke tle ke senwe senwelo se se botlhoko, le go itsemeletsa—
Le fa gontse jalo, a kgalalelo e nne go Rara, e bile Ke nole le go wetsa dipaakanyetso tsa me go bana ba batho.

Ke gone, Ke go laela gape go ikwatlhaya, e se re kgotsa Ka go nolofatsa ka thata ya maatla ame; le gore lo ipolele dibe tsa lona, e se re kgotsa la boga dikotlhao tseno tse ke buileng ka tsone, tse mo go tsone mo bonnyeng, ee, fela go lekana le selekanyo se se potlana se o utlwileng ka nako e ke gogetseng Mowa wa me.
Mme ke go laela gore o se rere sepe fa e se boikwatlhao, mme o se supe dilo tseno go lefatshe go fitlha e nna tlhalefo mo go nna.
Gonne ga ba ka ke ba itshokela nama jaanong, mme mashi ba tshwanetse go a amogela; ke gone, ga ba a tshwanela go itse dilo tseno, e se re kgotsa ba tlaa nyelela.
Ithute mo go nna, mme o reetse mafoko ame; tsamaya mo bonolong jwa Mowa wa me, mme o tlaa nna le kagiso mo go nna.
Ke nna Jeso Keresete; Ke tsile ka thato ya ga Rara, mme ke dira thato ya gagwe.
Mme gape, Ke a go laela gore o seka wa eletsa mosadi wa moagisanyi wa gago; le fa e le go batla botshelo jwa moagisanyi wa gago.
Mme gape, Ke a go laela gore o seka wa eletsa thata dithoto tsa gago, mme o di abe o gololesegile go gatisa Buka ya ga Momone, e e nang le boammaaruri le lefoko la Modimo—
E leng lefoko la me go Baditshaba, gore ka pela le ka ya go Bajuta, bao Balamanaetse e leng masalela a bone, gore ba ka dumela efangele, mme ba seka ba lebelela Mesia go tla yo a setseng a tsile.
Mme gape, Ke a go laola gore o rapele o ntsha mafoko gape le mo pelong; ee, fa pele ga lefatshe le mo sephiring, mo phatlhalatseng ga mmogo le mo bothokong.
Mme o tlaa bolela mafoko a a molemo, ee, o a anamise mo dithabeng, le mo mafelo otlhe a a tlotlometseng, le mo gare ga batho bangwe le bangwe bao o tla a letlelelwang go ba bona.
Mme o tlaa dira se ka boikokobetso jotlhe, o tshepa mo go nna, o sa kgale kgatlhanong le bakgadi.
Mme dithuto tse dithata o seka wa di bua, fa e se o bolela boikwatlhao le tumelo mo go Mmoloki, le phimolo dibe ka kolobetso, le ka molelo, ee, e leng Mowa o o Boitshepo.
Bona, se ke e kgolo e e bileng e le ya bofelo taelo e Ke tlaa go e nayang mabapi le kgang e; gonne se se tlaa lekana go tsamayang ga gago ka metlha, fela go ya bokhutlong jwa botshelo jwa gago.
Mme bohutsana o tlaa bo amogela fa o ka tlhokomologa bogakolodi jo, ee, le e leng tshenyego ya gago le dithoto.
Aba seabe sa dithoto tsa gago, ee, le e leng karolo ya ditsha tsa gago, mme tsotlhe fa e se fela go kokotlela lolwapa la gago.
Duela sekoloto se o se dumalaneng le mogatisi. Ikgolole mo botshwarong.
Tlogela ntlo le legae la gago, fa e se fela o eletsa go bona ba lolwapa la gago;
Mme o bue le botlhe ka kgololesego, ee, rera, kgothatsa, bolela boammaaruri, fela ka lentswe le le kwa godimo, ka tumo ya boipelo, o goa—Hosana, hosana, go segofadiwe leina la Morena Modimo!

Rapela ka metlha, mme Ke tlaa goromeletsa Mowa wa me mo go wena, mme tshegofatso ya gago e tlaa nna kgolo—ee, e bong bogolo segolo go feta fa o ka amogela matlotlo a lefatshe le go bola ga bophara jwa lone.
Bonang, a o ka bale se o sa ipele le go tsholeletsa pelo ya gago go itumela?
Kgotsa a o ka taboga taboga ka lobaka jaaka mokaedi wa sefofu?
Kgotsa a o ka nna boikokobetso le bonolo, mme wa itshwara ka tlhalefo fa pele ga me? Ee, tlaa kwa go nna Mmoloki wa gago. Amene.

/study/scriptures/dc-testament/dc/20.title: Dithuto le Dikgolagano 20
chapter_summary: 1–16, Buka ya ga Momone e supa semodimo sa tiro tsa malatsi a bofelo; 17–28, Dithuto tsa lebopo, go wa, tetlanyo, le kolobetso di a tlhomamisiwa; 29–37, Melao e e laolang boikwatlhao, tshiamiso, itshepiso, le kolobetso di bewa pele; 38–67, Ditiro tsa bagolwane, baperesiti, baruti, le batiakone di a sobokwa; 68–74, Ditiro tsa maloko, tshegofatso ya bana, le mokgwa wa kolobetso di a senolwa; 75–84, Dithapelo tsa sakaramente le melawana e e laolang boloko jwa Kereke di a neiwa.

verses.text: Go tsoga ga Kereke ya ga Keresete mo malatsing a bofelo, e le sekete makgolo a a ferangbobedi le masome a mararo a dingwaga ga e sa le go tla ga Morena wa rona le Mmoloki Jeso Keresete mo nameng, yone e ka gale e rulagangwang le go tlhomiwa go dumalana le melao ya lefatshe la rona, ka go rata le ka ditaelo tsa Modimo, mo kgweding ya bone, le ka letsatsi la borataro la kgwedi e e bidiwang Moranang—
